src: Do 17. septembra 1939 je bila poljska obramba že zlomljena, edino upanje pa sta bila umik in prerazporeditev ob romunskem mostišču. Ti načrti pa so postali zastareli praktično čez noč, ko je vkorakalo 800.000 vojakov Rdeče armade Sovjetske unije in vzpostavilo belorusko in ukrajinsko fronto po zasedbi vzhodnih poljskih regij, ki je bila v nasprotju z mirovno pogodbo iz Rige, sovjetsko-poljskim paktom o nenapadanju in drugimi mednarodnimi pogodbami, tako bilateralnimi kot multilateralnimi.
mt: By 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, the only hope being a retreat and redeployment across the Romanian bridgehead. These plans became obsolete practically overnight when 800,000 soldiers of the Red Army of the Soviet Union marched in and established a Belarusian and Ukrainian front after the occupation of eastern Polish regions, in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Pact of Non-Aggression and other international agreements, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Za Italijane so se zadeve v Severni Afriki odvijale slabo že od samega začetka. V enem tednu od italijanske vojne napovedi 10. junija 1940 so 11. britanski huzarji osvojili trdnjavo Capuzzo v Libiji. Britanci so v zasedi vzhodno od Bardie ujeli glavnega inženirja 10. italijanske vojske, generala Lastuccija. Maršal Italo Balbo, generalni guverner Libije in najverjetnejši Mussolinijev naslednik, je bil 28. junija ubit v prijateljskem ognju med pristankom v Tobruku.
mt: 11. British Hussars captured the fortress of Capuzzo in Libya in one week from the Italian declaration of war on June 10, 1940. The British captured the main engineer of the 10th Italian Army, General Lastuccia, in Bardia. Marshal Italo Balbo, the governor of Libya and the most likely successor to Mussolini, was killed in friendly fire during landing in Tobruk on June 28.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibetanski budizem sicer temelji na naukih Bude, vendar se ozira tudi na mahajansko pot ljubezni in številne tehnike iz indijske joge. Tibetanski budizem je načeloma zelo preprost. Sestavljajo ga joga kundalini, meditacija in pot brezpogojne ljubezni. Kundalini joga z jogijskimi položaji, dihalnimi vajami, mantrami in vizualizacijami omogoča prebujanje energije kundalini (energije razsvetljenja). Osrednja tibetanska meditacija je božanstvena joga. Z vizualizacijo različnih božanstev se očistijo energijski kanali, aktivirajo čakre in ustvari razsvetljena zavest.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but also looks to the Mahayana path of love and numerous techniques from Indian yoga. Tibetan Buddhism is generally very simple. It consists of kundalini yoga from yoga positions, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations allows awakening of kundalini energy (energy of enlightenment). The main Tibetan meditation is divine yoga. By visualizing different deities cleanses energy channels, activates chakras and creates enlightened consciousness.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Program se je začel ob 20.30 po lokalnem času (15.00 po UTC). Slavni pevci iz vse države so se stopalom Shri Shyama poklonili z bajani oziroma bogoslužnimi pesmimi. Večer je odprl pevec Sanju Sharma, sledil pa mu je Jai Shankar Choudhary. Lakkha Singh je predstavil tudi bajan chhappan bhog. Spremljal ga je pevec Raju Khandelwal. Pobudo pri petju bajanov je nato prevzel Lakkha Singh. Babi Shyamu so postregli 108 krožnikov chappan bhoga (v hinduizmu to pomeni 56 različnih jedi, kot so sladkarije, sadje, oreški, pripravljene jedi idr., ki se jih daruje božanstvu). Lakkha Singh je predstavil tudi bajan chhappan bhog. Spremljal ga je pevec Raju Khandelwal.
mt: 20.30 local time (15.00 UTC) the program began. Famous singers from all over the country have paid homage to Shri Shyama by singing bajan or devotional songs. The evening was opened by singer Sanju Sharma, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. Lakkha Singh presented the bajan chhappan bhog. It was followed by singer Raju Khandelwal. The initiative in singing bajans was then taken by Lakkha Singh. Bajans were followed by 108 chappan bhog (in Hinduism this means 56 different dishes, such as sweets, fruit, nuts, prepared dishes etc., which are offered to the deity). Lakkha Singh presented the bajan chhappan bhog. It was followed by singer Raju Khandelwal.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Slavje se je začelo s posebno predstavo svetovno znane zasedbe Cirque du Soleil. Sledili so istanbulski državni simfonični orkester, janičarska skupina in pevca Fatih Erkoç ter Müslüm Gürses. Nato so na oder stopili vrteči se derviši. Turška diva Sezen Aksu je nastopala z italijanskim tenoristom Alessandrom Safino in grško pevko Haris Alexiou. Za konec je turška plesna skupina Fire of Anatolia izvedla točko ""Troja""."
mt: "The celebration began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. This was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and singer Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Next came the whirling dervishes. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The celebration ended with a performance by the Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia, performing the piece ""Troy""."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Potnikom, ki so čakali pri 90-stopinjski (F) pripeki, so dali vodo. Gasilski poveljnik Scott Knous je dejal: ""V Santa Clari je bilo danes vroče, s temperaturami nad 90 stopinj. Biti ujet na vlaku smrti je milo rečeno neprijetno, kolikor dolgo že traja, da smo z vlakca spravili prvo osebo, pa smo potrebovali najmanj eno uro."""
mt: "Passengers waiting at Gate 90 (F) were given water. Fire Chief Scott Knous said, "It was hot in Santa Clara today, with temperatures over 90 degrees. Being trapped on the train of death is not a pleasant experience, how long it has been since we got the first person off the train, we needed at least one hour."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Glede na zadnjo objavo odčitki morske gladine kažejo, da se je ustvaril cunami. Zabeleženo je bilo nekaj očitne dejavnosti cunamija blizu mest Pago Paga in Niue. V Tongi niso poročali o večji škodi ali poškodbah, vendar pa je bila oskrba z električno energijo začasno prekinjena, kar naj bi tonškim oblastem preprečilo prejem opozorila o cunamiju, ki ga je sprožil PTWC. Štirinajst šol na Havajih, ki se nahajajo na obali ali v njeni bližini, je bilo v sredo ves dan zaprtih, čeprav so preklicali vsa opozorila.
mt: According to the latest reports, a tsunami has been generated.  Some tsunami activity was observed near the towns of Pago Pago and Niue.  In Tonga, no major damage or injuries were reported, but power was temporarily cut off, preventing the island's authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.  Fourteen schools on Hawaii, which are located on the coast or near it, were closed on Wednesday, although all warnings were cancelled.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, sovoznik novozelandske ekipe v seriji A1GP, se je danes zapisal v zgodovino z najhitrejšo legalno vožnjo čez 48-letni most Auckland Harbour Bridge na Novi Zelandiji. G. Reidu je uspelo, da je z avtomobilom novozelandske dirke A1GP, Black Beauty, sedemkrat prepeljal most s hitrostmi nad 160 km/h. Novozelandska policija je imela pri merjenju hitrosti vožnje g. Reida težave z uporabo pištole za merjenje hitrosti, ker je Črni lepotec tako nizek, zato je policiji uspelo posneti g. Reida šele, ko je upočasnil na 160 km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver of the New Zealand team in the A1GP series, has made history today by setting the fastest legal crossing of the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand. G. Reid managed to get the New Zealand A1GP car, Black Beauty, across the bridge seven times at speeds over 160 km/h. The New Zealand police had trouble using the speed gun to measure g. Reid's speed, as the Black Beauty is so low, so the police only managed to catch g. Reid when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Potres zmerne jakosti je v ponedeljek ob 22.08 stresel zahodno Montano. Ameriški seizmološki urad (USGS) in Nacionalni center za obveščanje o potresih nista prejela nobenih takojšnjih poročil o škodi. Žarišče potresa je bilo približno 20 km (15 milj) severno-severovzhodno od Dillona in približno 65 km (40 milj) južno od Butta.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana on Monday at 22.08. The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center have not received any immediate reports of damage. The epicenter was about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Iraški zapor Abu Ghraib so med izgredi zajeli plameni. Zapor je na slabem glasu, odkar so ugotovili, da je tam prihajalo do zlorabljanja zapornikov, ko so nadzor prevzele sile ZDA.
mt: Iraqi prison Abu Ghraib caught fire during riots. The prison has a bad reputation since it was discovered that prisoners were being abused there, when it was taken over by US forces.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Skupina je odpovedala svoj nastop na stadionu War Memorial v Mauiju, ki naj bi ga obiskalo 9000 ljudi, in se opravičila oboževalcem. Menedžerska družba skupine HK Management Inc. sprva ni podala nobenega razloga, ko so 20. septembra odpovedali nastop, naslednji dan pa so se izgovarjali na logistiko.
mt: The group canceled its performance at the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, which was expected to draw 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The group's management company, HK Management Inc., initially gave no reason for the Sept. 20 cancellation, then blamed logistics the next day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Vsesplošno plenjenje naj bi se nadaljevalo vso noč, saj na ulicah Biškeka ni bilo policistov. Po opisu enega od opazovalcev je Biškek tonil v stanje ""anarhije"", saj so se po ulicah sprehajale tolpe in pustošile po trgovinah s potrošniškim blagom. Nekateri prebivalci Biškeka so to brezpravje pripisali protestnikom z juga."
mt: "The looting was to continue throughout the night, as there were no police officers on the streets of Bishkek. According to the description of one of the observers, Bishkek was in a state of "anarchy", as mobs were walking the streets and looting shops with consumer goods. Some residents of Bishkek attributed this lawlessness to protesters from the south."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Poprej je Jamie Siminoff, direktor podjetja Ring, pripomnil, da je podjetje nastalo, ko ni slišal zvonca v svoji delavnici v garaži. Rekel je, da je izdelal brezžični hišni zvonec. Siminoff je dejal, da je prodaja narasla po tem, ko je leta 2013 nastopil v epizodi oddaje Shark Tank, kjer je komisija v oddaji zavrnila financiranje zagonskega podjetja. Konec leta 2017 se je Siminoff pojavil na prodajnem televizijskem kanalu QVC. Ring se je tudi pogodil za poravnavo s konkurenčno varnostno družbo ADT Corporation.
mt: Jamie Siminoff, CEO of Ring, previously said the company was founded when he didn't hear the doorbell in his garage workshop. He said he made a wireless home doorbell. Siminoff said sales grew after he appeared on the 2013 episode of Shark Tank, where the show's panel rejected funding for the startup. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring also settled with security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Oddaja televizijske postaje PBS je prejela več kot dvajset nagrad Emmy, od nje pa se dalj časa predvajata samo Sezamova ulica in serija Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Vsaka epizoda oddaje je bila osredotočena na temo iz določene knjige, ki jo je nato preučila z več zgodbami. Vsaka oddaja je podala tudi priporočila za knjige, ki naj jih otroci poiščejo, ko obiščejo knjižnico. John Grant z radiotelevizijske postaje WNED (domača postaja oddaje Reading Rainbow) je rekel: ""Oddaja Reading Rainbow je otroke učila, zakaj brati, ... ljubezni do branja – [oddaja] je otroke spodbujala, naj vzamejo knjigo v roke in berejo."" Nekateri, vključno z Johnom Grantom, menijo, da je do ukinitve televizijskih oddaj prišlo zaradi pomanjkanja denarja in preskoka v filozofiji izobraževalnih televizijskih programov."
mt: "The PBS show has won more than twenty Emmys, and for years the only episodes shown were Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show was focused on a theme from a particular book, which was then read with several stories. Each episode also gave recommendations for books that children could find when they visited the library. John Grant of the radio-television station WNED (the local station for the show Reading Rainbow) said, ""The show Reading Rainbow taught children why to read,... love of reading – [the show] encouraged children to take a book in their hands and read."" Some, including John Grant, believe the show was canceled due to lack of money and a shift in philosophy of educational television programs."
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Uradniki mesta Amsterdam in Muzeja Ane Frank pravijo, da je drevo okuženo z glivo in predstavlja nevarnost za javno zdravje, saj trdijo, da je grozila neposredna nevarnost, da bi se podrlo. Posekano naj bi bilo v torek, vendar so ga rešili z interventno sodno odločbo.
mt: Officials from the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum say the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a threat to public health, as they claim there is an immediate danger that it could topple. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but it was saved by an injunction.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Osvoboditev živali in Kraljevo društvo za preprečevanje krutosti do živali (RSPCA) ponovno pozivata k obvezni namestitvi nadzornih kamer v avstralskih klavnicah. Glavni inšpektor RSPCA New South Wales David O'Shannessy je za ABC povedal, da bi v Avstraliji morala biti nadzor in inšpekcija klavnic nekaj običajnega. ""CCTV bi nedvomno poslala jasno sporočilo vsem, ki se ukvarjajo z živalmi, da je dobro počutje živali najpomembnejše."""
mt: "The RSPCA and Animals Australia are again calling for mandatory CCTV in Australian abattoirs. RSPCA NSW chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that CCTV should be standard in Australian abattoirs. ""CCTV would send a clear message to everyone involved in the industry that animal welfare is the most important thing."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: V času pogreba Jeffa Weisa in treh od devetih žrtev se je v skupnosti Red Lake razširila novica, da je bil v povezavi s streljanjem na šoli 21. marca aretiran še en študent. Oblasti so samo potrdile današnjo aretacijo, niso pa podale dodatnih uradnih izjav. Vir, ki ima informacije o preiskavi, pa je za Minneapolis Star-Tribune povedal, da je bil Louis Jourdain, 16-letni sin predsednika plemena Red Lake Floyda Jourdaina. Trenutno še ni znano, kakšne obtožbe bodo podane ali kaj je oblasti privedlo do fanta, vendar se je obravnava mladoletnika na zveznem sodišču že pričela.
mt: At the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims, the news spread in the Red Lake community that another student had been arrested in connection with the shooting at the school on March 21. Authorities only confirmed the arrest today, but did not give any further official statements. A source with information on the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain, was the suspect. It is currently unknown what charges will be filed or what led authorities to the teen, but the juvenile's case has already begun in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Po besedah organizatorjev protesta se je v nemških mestih, kot so Berlin, Köln, Hamburg in Hannover, zbralo okoli 100.000 ljudi. Po ocenah policije je bilo v Berlinu 6500 protestnikov. Protesti so potekali tudi v Parizu, Sofiji v Bolgariji, Vilni v Litvi, Valletti na Malti, Talinu v Estoniji in Edinburgu in Glasgowu na Škotskem. V Londonu je približno 200 ljudi protestiralo pred poslovnimi prostori enega večjih nosilcev avtorskih pravic. Prejšnji mesec so na Poljskem potekali večji protesti, ko je država podpisala sporazum ACTA, zaradi katerega se je poljska vlada odločila, da zaenkrat ne bo ratificirala sporazuma. Latvija in Slovaška sta obe odložili postopek pridružitve sporazumu ACTA.
mt: According to organizers, about 100,000 people protested in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. Police estimated 6,500 protesters in Berlin. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valletta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. About 200 people protested in front of business premises of one of the major copyright holders in London. Earlier in the month, larger protests took place in Poland when the country signed the ACTA agreement, causing the Polish government to decide to temporarily not ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia both postponed the process of joining the ACTA agreement.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Prijavljenih je bilo približno 60 primerov pregrevanja nedelujočih iPodov, ki so povzročili šest požarov in lažje opekline pri štirih osebah. Iz japonskega Ministrstva za gospodarstvo, trgovino in industrijo (METI) so sporočili, da so vedeli za 27 nesreč, povezanih z napravami. Prejšnji teden je METI objavilo, da ga je družba Apple obvestila o dodatnih 34 incidentih s pregretjem, ki pa jih je družba označila za ""nenevarne"". Odziv ministrstva je bil, da je Applova odložitev poročila ""resnično obžalovanja vredna""."
mt: 60 cases of overheating non-functioning iPods were reported, causing six fires and minor burns to four people. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said they were aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had notified them of an additional 34 overheating incidents, which Apple had classified as "non-hazardous". METI's response was that Apple's delay in reporting was "truly regrettable".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Prijavljenih je bilo približno 60 primerov pregrevanja nedelujočih iPodov, ki so povzročili šest požarov in lažje opekline pri štirih osebah. Iz japonskega Ministrstva za gospodarstvo, trgovino in industrijo (METI) so sporočili, da so vedeli za 27 nesreč, povezanih z napravami. Prejšnji teden je METI objavilo, da ga je družba Apple obvestila o dodatnih 34 incidentih s pregretjem, ki pa jih je družba označila za ""nenevarne"". Odziv ministrstva je bil, da je Applova odložitev poročila ""resnično obžalovanja vredna""."

src: "Direktor Appla Steve Jobs je napravo predstavil tako, da je stopil na oder in vzel iPhone iz žepa svojih kavbojk. V dvournem govoru je izjavil: ""danes bo Apple ponovno izumil telefon, danes pišemo zgodovino""."
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced the device by stepping onto the stage and pulling an iPhone out of his jeans pocket. In a two-hour presentation, he said: ""Today Apple will reinvent the phone, today we will write history."""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Zdajšnja senatorka in prva dama Argentine Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner je včeraj zvečer naznanila svojo predsedniško kandidaturo v La Plati, mestu, 50 kilometrov (31 milj) oddaljenem od Buenos Airesa. Ga. Kirchner je v Argentinskem teatru, kjer je tudi leta 2005 začela svojo kampanjo za volitve v senat kot članica delegacije pokrajine Buenos Aires, naznanila, da namerava kandidirati za predsednico.
mt: Former senator and first lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires, yesterday evening. Ga. Kirchner announced that she intends to run for president in the Argentine Theater, where she also began her campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA je nadalje ugotovila, da s pretakanjem videoposnetka na spletu Big Brother ni kršil zakona o cenzuri spletnih vsebin, saj te medijske vsebine niso bile shranjene na spletni strani Big Brotherja. Zakon o radiodifuzijski dejavnosti ureja regulacijo spletnih vsebin, vendar morajo biti te fizično shranjene na strežniku, da se štejejo kot vsebina.
mt: ACMA has further found that by downloading a video clip from the Big Brother website did not breach the censorship law, as the media content was not stored on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act regulates online content, but these must be physically stored on a server to be counted as content.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Peter Costello, avstralski finančni minister, ki je kot vodja Liberalne stranke najverjetnejši naslednik premierja Johna Howarda, podpira industrijo jedrske energije v Avstraliji. G. Costello je rekel, da bi Avstralija morala začeti uporabljati jedrsko energijo, ko bo njeno pridobivanje postalo gospodarsko donosno. Če postane komercialna, bi jo morali imeti. To pomeni, da načeloma ni nobenega ugovora proti jedrski energiji,"" je dejal Costello."
mt: "Peter Costello, Australia's finance minister, who is the most likely successor to Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, supports the nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr. Costello said Australia should begin using nuclear power when its production becomes economically viable. If it becomes commercially viable, we should have it. This means, in principle, there is no objection to nuclear power,"" Mr. Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Ker je dnevno na voljo le osemnajst medalj, se več državam ni uspelo uvrstiti na stopničke. Mednje spadata tudi Nizozemska, katere predstavnica Anna Jochemsen je zasedla deveto mesto v včerajšnjem superveleslalomu, in Finska, za katero je tekmovala Katja Saarinen, ki je končala na desetem mestu v isti disciplini. Avstralec Mitchell Gourley je v moškem stoječem superveleslalomu zasedel enajsto mesto. Češki tekmovalec Oldrich Jelinek je v moškem sedečem superveleslalomu zasedel šestnajsto mesto. Mehiški tekmovalec Arly Velasquez je končal na petnajstem mestu v moškem sedečem superveleslalomu. Novozelandec Adam Hall je zasedel deveto mesto v moškem stoječem superveleslalomu. Poljski smučar z okvaro vida Maciej Krezel in spremljevalka Anna Ogarzynska sta bila trinajsta v superveleslalomu. Južnokorejski Jong Seork Park je bil štiriindvajseti v sedečem superveleslalomu.
mt: 18 medals are available daily, so many countries were unable to medal. Among them are the Netherlands, whose representative Anna Jochemsen finished ninth in yesterday's supergiant slalom, and Finland, for which Katja Saarinen finished tenth in the same discipline. Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing supergiant slalom. Czech Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's seated supergiant slalom. Mexican Arly Velasquez finished fifteenth in the men's seated supergiant slalom. New Zealander Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing supergiant slalom. Polish skier with visual impairment Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska were thirteenth in the supergiant slalom. South Korean Jong Seork Park was twenty-fourth in the seated supergiant slalom.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Sojenje je potekalo v Kraljevem sodišču v Birminghamu in se je zaključilo 3. avgusta. Voditelj, ki so ga aretirali na kraju dogodka, je napad zanikal in trdil, da se je s kolom branil pred steklenicami, ki jih je vanj metalo okoli 30 ljudi. Blake je bil obsojen tudi zaradi poskusa vplivanja na sodni proces. Sodnik je Blakeu dejal, da bo ""skoraj zanesljivo"" moral v zapor."
mt: "The trial took place at the Royal Court in Birmingham and ended on August 3. The leader, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed that he was defending himself with a stick against bottles thrown at him by about 30 people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to influence the judicial process. The judge told Blake that he would ""almost certainly"" have to go to prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Med drugimi tematikami, ki jih bodo obravnavali na Baliju, so reševanje preostalih gozdov sveta in skupna raba tehnologij, ki državam v razvoju omogočajo rast na načine, ki manj onesnažujejo okolje. ZN si prizadeva tudi za dokončno vzpostavitev sklada za pomoč državam, ki jih je prizadelo globalno segrevanje, pri spopadanju z njegovimi posledicami. Denar bi lahko namenili za protipoplavne hiše, učinkovitejše upravljanje z vodo in povečanje raznovrstnosti posevkov.
mt: Among other topics to be discussed at Bali are the preservation of the world's remaining forests and the joint use of technologies that allow developing countries to grow in ways that pollute less. The UN is also working to finally establish a fund to help countries hit by global warming, in fighting its consequences. The money could be used for flood-resistant homes, more effective water management and increased crop diversity.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Nigerija je predhodno napovedala, da se namerava v tednu pred vrhom pridružiti AfCFTA. Albert Muchanga, komisar Afriške unije za trgovino in industrijo, je naznanil, da se bo pridružil tudi Benin. Komisar je rekel: ""Nismo se še dogovorili glede pravili o poreklu in tarifnih koncesijah, vendar lahko z obstoječim ogrodjem začnemo trgovati že 1. julija 2020""."
mt: "Nigeria had previously announced that it would join the AfCFTA in the week before the summit. Albert Muchanga, the African Union's commissioner for trade and industry, announced that Benin would also join. The commissioner said: ""We have not yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff concessions, but we can start trading with the existing fence on July 1, 2020."""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Med bivanjem v Atlanti je bila deležna pohval in priznana zaradi inovativnega urbanega izobraževanja. Leta 2009 je dobila naziv državna inšpektorica leta. V času nagrade je bil opazen velik napredek v rezultatih testov v atlantskih šolah. Kmalu zatem je časopis Atlanta Journal-constitution objavil poročilo, ki je izpostavilo težave z rezultati testiranja. Poročilo je pokazalo, da so se rezultati testov neverjetno hitro izboljšali, in domnevalo, da je šola interno zaznala težave, vendar v zvezi z ugotovitvami ni ukrepala. Dokazi so zatem pokazali, da je prišlo do nepooblaščenega ravnanja z izpitnimi polami. Zoper Hallovo in 34 drugih uradnih oseb v izobraževanju so leta 2013 vložili obtožnico.
mt: While living in Atlanta, she was praised and recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was named Georgia's State Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, there was a notable improvement in test results in Atlanta schools. Shortly thereafter, the Atlanta Journal-constitution published a report that highlighted problems with test results. The report showed that test results had improbably improved, and suggested that the school had internally identified problems, but had not taken action in response to the findings. Evidence later showed that there had been improper handling of test materials. Charges were filed against Hall and 34 other school officials in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Eno od bomb je razneslo pred uradom generalnega guvernerja. V bližini vladnih zgradb so v roku dveh ur eksplodirale še tri bombe. V nekaterih poročilih je uradno število smrti osem, v uradnih poročilih je potrjeno do 30 poškodovanih, končne številke pa še niso znane.
mt: One of the bombs exploded in front of the governor's office. Three bombs exploded in the vicinity of government buildings in the next two hours. Official death toll is eight, with up to 30 injured, final numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21-letni Jesus se je iz brazilskega kluba Palmeiras Manchester City-ju pridružil lani, januarja 2017, in sicer naj bi po poročanju medijev zanj odšteli 27 milijonov funtov. Od takrat je Brazilec za klub igral v 53 tekmah v vseh tekmovanjih in dal 24 golov.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City from Brazilian club Palmeiras last January 2017, reportedly costing the club £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games in all competitions for the club and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: 21-letni Jesus se je iz brazilskega kluba Palmeiras Manchester City-ju pridružil lani, januarja 2017, in sicer naj bi po poročanju medijev zanj odšteli 27 milijonov funtov. Od takrat je Brazilec za klub igral v 53 tekmah v vseh tekmovanjih in dal 24 golov.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City from Brazilian club Palmeiras last January 2017, reportedly costing the club £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games in all competitions for the club and scored 24 goals.

src: V Meki, islamskem svetem mestu, se je davi okoli desete ure po lokalnem času zrušil hostel. Stavba je nudila zatočišče številnim romarjem, ki so obiskali sveto mesto na predvečer romanja hadž. Hotelski gosti so bili večinoma državljani Združenih arabskih emiratov. Smrtnih žrtev je najmanj 15, vendar pričakujejo, da bo število še naraslo.
mt: In Mecca, an Islamic holy city, a hotel collapsed around 10 am local time. The building housed many pilgrims who were visiting the holy city before the start of the Hajj. Hotel guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. There are at least 15 dead, but the number is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satelita, ki sta oba tehtala več kot 1000 funtov, in sta potovala s hitrostjo približno 17.500 milj na uro, sta trčila 491 milj nad zemljo. Znanstveniki pravijo, da je bila eksplozija, ki jo je povzročil trk, ogromna. Še vedno poskušajo ugotoviti, kako obsežen je bil ta trk in kako bo vplival na Zemljo. Ameriško strateško poveljstvo na uradu Ministrstva za obrambo ZDA spremlja raznašanje drobirja. Rezultat analize za vrisovanje bo objavljen na javnem spletnem mestu.
mt: The two satellites, each weighing more than 1000 pounds, and traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was enormous. They are still trying to determine how extensive the collision was and how it will affect the Earth. The American Strategic Command at the Department of Defense is monitoring the debris. The results of the analysis will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten je leta 2008 zasedel 190. mesto na seznamu 400 najbogatejših Američanov, njegovo premoženje pa je bilo ocenjeno na 2,3 milijarde dolarjev. Leta 1950 je diplomiral na Fakulteti za umetnost in znanost Univerze v Virginiji in je bil velik donator tej ustanovi.
mt: Batten was ranked 190th on the Forbes 400 list of richest Americans in 2008, with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and was a major donor to the university.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "Guverner Kalifornije Arnold Schwarzenegger je podpisal zakon, ki mladoletnikom prepoveduje nakup ali izposojo nasilnih video iger. Po tem predlogu zakona morajo biti nasilne videoigre, prodane v zvezni državi Kalifornija, označene z nalepko ""18"", njihova prodaja mladoletnikom pa bi bila kaznovana z globo v višini 1000 dolarjev."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that prohibits minors from buying or renting violent video games. Under the proposed law, violent video games sold in the state of California must be labeled with a ""18"" sticker, and their sale to minors would be punishable by a fine of $1000."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall, ki je poročen in ima dva odrasla otroka, ni naredil dobrega vtisa na Millerja, kateremu je zgodbo pripovedoval. Ko so ga prosili za komentar, je Miller dejal: ""Mike na zaslišanjih veliko govori ... Pripravljal sem se, zato ga nisem zares poslušal."""
mt: "Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make a good impression on Miller, who was telling him the story. When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot at the hearings... I was prepared, so I wasn't really listening.""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Predsednik vlade Stephen Harper se je po torkovem 25-minutnem srečanju z vodjo NDP, Jackom Laytonom, v kabinetu predsednika vlade strinjal, da se vladni »zakon o čistem zraku« pred drugim branjem pošlje v pregled vsestrankarskemu odboru. Layton je med sestankom s predsednikom vlade zaprosil za spremembe okoljskega zakona konservativcev in konservativno stranko pozval, naj ""temeljito in v celoti na novo napiše"" svoj okoljski zakon. Ko je v dogajanje posegla zvezna vlada in prevzela financiranje bolnišnice Mersey v Devonportu v Tasmaniji, so državna vlada in nekateri zvezni poslanci to dejanje kritično označili za promocijsko potezo pred začetkom novembrskih zveznih volitev. Predsednik vlade John Howard pa je rekel, da bo zakon zgolj varoval bolnišnične objekte pred tem, da bi jih tasmanska vlada degradirala, tako da jim zagotovi dodatnih 45 milijonov avstralskih dolarjev."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in the Prime Minister's office to send the government's "clean air" bill back to committee for review by all-party committee. Layton asked the Prime Minister to amend the Conservative government's environmental bill and called on the Conservatives to "fundamentally and completely rewrite" their environmental bill. When the federal government and some federal MPs criticized the state government's takeover of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, as a promotional move before the November federal elections, Prime Minister John Howard said the bill would only protect the hospital facilities from the state government's degradation, so that it would provide an additional $45 million Australian dollars."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: V vzorcih urina domačih ljubljenčkov, ki so poginili zaradi zaužitja zastrupljene hrane, so našli tako cianurično kislino kot melamin. Spojini med sabo reagirata in tvorita kristale, ki lahko ovirajo normalno delovanje ledvic, pravijo raziskovalci z univerze. Raziskovalci so opazili, da so z dodajanjem melamina in cianurske kisline v mačjem urinu nastali kristali. Ob primerjavi z infrardečo spektroskopijo (FTIR) se sestava teh kristalov ujema s sestavo tistih, ki so jih našli v urinu prizadetih hišnih ljubljenčkov.
mt: In urine samples from domestic pets that died from eating tainted food, researchers found both cyanuric acid and melamine. The two substances react with each other to form crystals that can interfere with normal kidney function, researchers from the university say. Researchers observed that by adding melamine and cyanuric acid to cat urine, crystals formed. The composition of these crystals matched the composition of those found in the urine of affected house pets, when compared with infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Po poročanju Xinhua so vladni preiskovalci v sredo našli dve ""črni skrinjici"" letala. Luni so se poklonili tudi kolegi rokoborci. ""Luna je bila prva kraljica Extrema. Moja prva menedžerka. Luna je umrla na noč dveh lun. Prav tako enkratno, kot je bila ona sama. Močna ženska,"" je dejal Tommy Dreamer. Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels je komentiral, da je bila ""Luna prav tako čudaška kot jaz ... morda še bolj ... rad jo imam in pogrešal jo bom ... upam, da je na lepšem kraju""."
mt: "According to Xinhua, government investigators found two "black boxes" of the plane on Wednesday. They also paid tribute to their colleagues on the moon. "The moon was the first queen of Extreme. My first manager. The moon died on the night of two moons. Just once, as she was herself. A strong woman," said Tommy Dreamer. Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that Luna was "just as amazing as I am... maybe more... I love her and I will miss her... I hope she is in a better place.""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Čeprav so bili v hiši trije ljudje, ko je vanjo trčil avtomobil, nobeden od njih ni bil poškodovan. Voznik pa je utrpel resne poškodbe glave. Cesto, kjer je prišlo do trčenja, so začasno zaprli, da so lahko službe za nujno pomoč voznika osvobodile iz rdečega Audija TT. Najprej je bil hospitaliziran v bolnišnici James Paget v Great Yarmouthu. Kasneje so ga premestili v bolnišnico Addenbrooke's Hospital v Cambridgeu.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car crashed into it, none of them were injured. The driver sustained serious head injuries. The road where the crash occurred was closed temporarily to allow emergency services to free the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalized at the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to the Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Igre so se začele ob 10.00 z odličnim vremenom in, z izjemo nekaj kapljic dežja sredi dopoldneva, ki je kmalu ponehal, je bil dan popoln za ragbi sedmico. Južna Afrika, favorit turnirja, je dobro začela, ko je brez težav zmagala 26:00 proti peti nosilki Zambiji. Čeprav je v tekmi proti svojim južnim sestram delovala malo iz forme, je Južna Afrika z odvijanjem turnirja vztrajno napredovala. Izstopali so zaradi svoje disciplinirane obrambe, spretnega rokovanja z žogo in odličnega timskega dela in jasno je bilo, da gre za glavno nasprotnico.
mt: The games began at 10:00 with excellent weather and, except for a few drops of rain in the middle of the afternoon, the day was perfect for rugby sevens. South Africa, the tournament favorite, got off to a good start, beating fifth-ranked Zambia 26:00 without difficulty. Although it was playing a little out of form, South Africa steadily progressed through the tournament. They stood out for their disciplined defense, clever handling of the ball, and excellent team play, and it was clear they were the main opposition.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: V zadnjih treh desetletjih je Kitajska razvila tržno gospodarstvo, kljub temu da je uradno ostala komunistična država. Prve gospodarske reforme so bile izvedene pod vodstvom Denga Šjaopinga. Od takrat se je kitajsko gospodarstvo povečalo za 90-krat. Kitajska je lani prvič izvozila več avtomobilov kot Nemčija in je kot največji trg v tej industriji prehitela Združene države. BDP Kitajske bi lahko v dveh desetletjih presegel BDP Združenih držav.
mt: In the last three decades, China has developed a market economy, despite remaining officially a communist state. The first economic reforms were carried out under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, the Chinese economy has grown by 90-fold. China exported more cars last year than Germany and has overtaken the United States as the largest market in this industry. China's GDP could surpass that of the United States in two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Trudili se bomo, da bi do leta 2020 pomembno zmanjšali emisije ogljikovega dioksida na enoto BDP s stopnje iz leta 2005,"" je dejal Hu. Za omejitve ni določil številke, saj naj bi po njegovih besedah temeljile na gospodarskem rezultatu Kitajske. Hu je spodbujal države v razvoju, ""naj se izognejo starim navadam, ko se najprej onesnažuje in potem čisti."" Dodal je, da ""pa jih ne bi smeli prositi, da prevzamejo obveznosti, ki presegajo njihovo stopnjo razvoja, odgovornosti ali sposobnosti""."
mt: """We will strive to significantly reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a number for the limits, saying they would be based on China's economic result. Hu encouraged developing countries, ""not to follow the old practice of first polluting and then cleaning up."" He added that ""they should not be asked to take on obligations that exceed their level of development, responsibility or capacity.""
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Dobrodelna zdravstvena organizacija Mangola, Zdravniki brez meja in Svetovna zdravstvena organizacija pravijo, da gre za najhujši izbruh, ki so ga kdajkoli zabeležili v tej državi. ""Angola je pred najhujšim izbruhom in razmere tu so še vedno izjemno slabe,"" je dejal predstavnik zdravnikov brez meja, Richard Veerman."
mt: "The charity health organization Mangola, Doctors Without Borders and the World Health Organization say this is the worst outbreak ever recorded in this country. ""Angola is facing its worst outbreak ever and the situation here is still very bad,"" said a representative of Doctors Without Borders, Richard Veerman."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Direktor javnega pregona Kier Starmer QC je zjutraj podal izjavo, v kateri je naznanil, da bosta tako Huhne kot Pryce kazensko preganjana. Huhne je odstopil, v vladi ga bo nadomestil poslanec Ed Davey. Poslanec Norman Lamb naj bi prevzel mesto ministra za poslovne zadeve, ki ga zapušča Davey. Huhne in Pryce naj bi se na sodišču v Westminstru zagovarjala 16. februarja.
mt: Director of Public Prosecutions Kier Starmer QC announced this morning that both Huhne and Pryce will be prosecuted. Huhne has resigned, and will be replaced in the cabinet by MP Ed Davey. MP Norman Lamb will take over the role of business secretary, which Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce will be tried at Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Zgodba, ki je predstavljena v francoski operi Camilla Saint-Seansa, je zgodba o umetniku ""čigar življenje sta narekovala ljubezen do drog in Japonska"". Nastopajoči tako kadijo travo na odru in gledališče še spodbuja publiko, da se jim pridruži."
mt: "The story presented in the French opera Camille Saint-Saëns is the story of an artist ""whose life was dictated by love of drugs and Japan."" The performers so mow the grass on the stage and the audience is encouraged to join them."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "Leonov, znan tudi kot ""kozmonavt št. 11"", je bil del prvotne ekipe kozmonavtov Sovjetske zveze. 18. marca 1965 je izvedel prvo dejavnost človeka zunaj plovila (EVA) oziroma ""hojo po vesolju"", pri čemer je sam zunaj vesoljskega plovila ostal nekaj manj kot dvanajst minut. Za svoje delo je prejel najvišje odlikovanje Sovjetske zveze, ""Heroj Sovjetske zveze"". Deset let pozneje je vodil sovjetski del misije Apollo-Soyuz, ki je označevala konec vesoljske tekme."
mt: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut number 11"", was part of the original crew of the Soviet Union's cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first human activity outside the spacecraft (EVA) or ""walking in space"", during which he remained outside the spacecraft for less than twelve minutes. For his work he was awarded the highest award of the Soviet Union, ""Hero of the Soviet Union"". Ten years later he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which marked the end of the space race."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Gibsona so po nesreči odpeljali v bolnišnico, vendar je kmalu zatem umrl. 64-letni voznik tovornjaka se v trku ni poškodoval. Samo vozilo je bilo s kraja nesreče odstranjeno ob približno 12. uri po GMT istega dne. Oseba, ki dela v delavnici blizu kraja nesreče, je povedala: ""Tam so bili otroci, ki so čakali, da bi prečkali cesto, in vsi so kričali in jokali."" Pritekli so z mesta, kjer se je zgodila nesreča."
mt: 64-year-old truck driver was not injured in the crash. The truck was removed from the scene of the crash around noon GMT the same day. A person who works in the workshop near the scene of the accident said: "There were children waiting to cross the road, and all were crying and screaming." People came from the scene of the accident.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Opravljeno delo je bilo večinoma teoretično, vendar je bil program napisan za simulacijo opazovanja ozvezdja Strelca. Učinek, ki ga je želela doseči ekipa, bi povzročile plimske sile med temno snovjo v galaksiji in temno snovjo v Rimski cesti. Tako kot Mesec privlači Zemljo in povzroči plimovanje, tudi Mlečna cesta s silo vpliva na ozvezdje Strelca. Znanstveniki so lahko zaključili, da je temna snov na drugo temno snov deluje podobno kot običajna snov. Po tej teoriji naj bi se večina temne snovi okrog galaksije zadrževala okoli nje v obliki obroča, sestavljenega iz številnih malih delcev.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of the constellation of Sagittarius. The effect that the team wanted to achieve would be caused by tides between the dark matter in the Milky Way and the dark matter in the Sagittarius Dwarf Galaxy. Just as the Moon attracts the Earth and causes tides, the Milky Way with its force affects the Sagittarius Dwarf Galaxy. Scientists were able to conclude that dark matter acts on other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter. According to this theory, most of the dark matter around the galaxy would remain in the form of a ring, consisting of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "Debato je sprožila polemika glede čezmerne porabe sredstev za ublažitev in obnovo po orkanu Katrina, ki so jo nekateri davčni konservativci pikro označili kot ""Bushev novoorleanški dogovor"". Liberalna kritika poskusa obnove se je osredotočila na dodeljevanje pogodb za obnovo osebam, domnevno v tesnem odnosu z Washingtonom."
mt: "The debate was sparked by a controversy over excessive spending on relief and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina, which some tax-cutting conservatives derisively labeled the ""Bush New Orleans deal"". Liberal criticism of the rebuilding effort focused on contracts for rebuilding to individuals, allegedly in close relationship with Washington."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

Liberalna kritika poskusa obnove se je osredotočila na dodeljevanje pogodb za obnovo osebam, domnevno v tesnem odnosu z Washingtonom."

src: Ko se bo kapsula ob 5-ih (ET) približala Zemlji in vstopila v atmosfero, je pričakovati lep ognjemet, ki bo viden v severni Kaliforniji, Oregonu, Nevadi in Utahu. Kapsula bo spominjala na utrinek, ko bo preletela nebo. Kapsula bo potovala približno 12,8 km ali 8 milj na sekundo oziroma tako hitro, da bi iz San Francisca v Los Angeles pripotovala v eni minuti. Stardust bo postavil nov svetovni rekord za najhitrejše vračanje vesoljskega plovila na Zemljo, pri čemer je podrl prejšnji rekord, dosežen maja 1969 ob vrnitvi modula za upravljanje Apollo X. »Potovala bo prek zahodne obale severne Kalifornije in osvetlila nebo od Kalifornije do osrednjega Oregona in še naprej prek Nevade ter Idaha do Utaha,« je povedal Tom Duxbury, projektni vodja projekta Stardust.
mt: When the capsule approaches Earth at 5 p.m. ET and enters the atmosphere, expect a bright fireball visible in northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will resemble a meteor as it passes through the sky. The capsule will travel about 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per second, or fast enough to travel from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new world record for the fastest return of a spacecraft to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May 1969 on the return of the Apollo X command module. »It will fly over the west coast of northern California and light up the sky from California to central Oregon and beyond through Nevada and Idaho to Utah,« said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Zdravnica, ki je delala v otroški bolnišnici v Pittsburghu v Pensilvaniji, bo obtožena naklepnega umora, potem ko so njeno mater našli mrtvo v prtljažniku njenega avta, pravijo oblasti v Ohiu. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, so našli v Blue Ashu v Ohiu, predmestju, približno 15 milj oddaljenem od Cincinnatija, ko je v majici s kratkimi rokavi in spodnjem perilu ležala na tleh ob cesti pod očitnim vplivom zdravil. Policiste je usmerila k svojemu črnemu Oldsmobile Intrigue, ki je bil oddaljen 500 čevljev. Tam so našli truplo 53-letne Saroje Balasubramanian, pokrito s krvavimi odejami. Policija je dejala, da je bilo truplo tam verjetno približno en dan.
mt: A nurse who worked at a children's hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, will be charged with attempted murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, about 15 miles away from Cincinnati, wearing a short-sleeved shirt and a skirt lying on the ground near the road under apparent influence of drugs. Police directed her to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was about 500 feet away. There they found the body of 53-year-old Saroja Balasubramanian, covered in bloody bandages. Police said the body was likely there about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: To je največji prevzem v zgodovini eBaya. Podjetje si prizadeva, da bi razširilo svojo mrežo dobičkonosnih virov in povečalo svojo priljubljenost na območjih, kjer prevladuje Skype, na primer na Kitajskem, v Vzhodni Evropi in Braziliji.
mt: This is eBay's largest acquisition in history. The company is trying to expand its network of profitable sources and increase its popularity in areas where Skype dominates, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Ko so ranjene prepeljali v bolnišnico in se je pretep končal, se približno 40 preostalih zapornikov, ki so ostali na dvorišču, ni hotelo vrniti v svoje celice. Pogajalci so poskušali rešiti situacijo, vendar zaporniki niso podali jasnih zahtev. Med 22. in 23. uro po MDT so zaporniki na dvorišču zanetili ogenj. Kmalu so na dvorišče prišli policisti v protiizgredni opremi in jetnike obvladali s solzivcem. Gasilske reševalne ekipe so ob 23.35 naposled le ukrotile požar.
mt: When the injured were taken to the hospital and the riot was over, about 40 of the remaining inmates did not want to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates did not give clear demands. At around 10:22 pm MDT, inmates on the yard set fire to the yard. Soon, riot police in riot gear arrived and subdued the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue teams finally extinguished the fire at 11:35 pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "Ti komentarji, ki so bili v živo predvajani po televiziji, predstavljajo prvi primer, ko so starejši iranski viri priznali, da so sankcije dosegle določen učinek. Vanje so zajete finančne omejitve in prepoved EU glede izvoza surove nafte, ki iranskemu gospodarstvu prinese 80 % tujega prihodka. OPEC je v zadnjem mesečnem poročilu zapisala, da je izvoz surove nafte padel na najnižjo raven v zadnjih dveh desetletjih, in sicer na 2,8 milijona sodčkov na dan. Vrhovni voditelj države, ajatola Ali Hamenej, je odvisnost od nafte opisal kot ""past"", ki izvira še iz časov pred iransko muslimansko revolucijo leta 1979, iz katere bi se morala država izviti."
mt: "These comments, which were broadcast live on television, represent the first time that senior Iranian sources have acknowledged that sanctions have achieved a certain effect. They include financial restrictions and an EU ban on crude oil exports, which account for 80 percent of Iran's foreign income. OPEC has recorded in its latest monthly report that crude oil exports have fallen to their lowest level in two decades, at 2.8 million barrels per day. Supreme leader of the country, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, described dependence on oil as a "trap" that originated in the pre-revolutionary era of 1979, from which the country should be extricated."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: V Franciji so bile volitve vedno nizkotehnološke: volivci se skrijejo v posamične kabine in vstavijo vnaprej natisnjeni list papirja z označeno izbiro v ovojnico. Ko uradne osebe potrdijo istovetnost volivca, ta ovojnico odda v volilno skrinjico in se podpiše na volilni imenik. Francoska volilna zakonodaja precej strogo določa ta postopek. Od leta 1988 morajo biti volilne skrinjice prosojne, da lahko volivci in opazovalci vidijo, da ob začetku volitev v njih ni nobene ovojnice in da ni bila dodana nobena druga ovojnica, razen tistih, ki jih oddajo ustrezno vpisani in pooblaščeni volivci. Kandidati lahko pošljejo predstavnike, da opazujejo vse dele postopka. Zvečer prostovoljci pod strogim nadzorom preštejejo glasove, pri čemer upoštevajo določene postopke.
mt: In France, elections have always been low-tech: voters hide in individual booths and insert a pre-printed piece of paper with a marked choice in a ballot box. When official people confirm the identity of the voter, they hand over the ballot box to the voting booth and sign the voting register. French electoral legislation quite strictly defines this process. Since 1988, voting booths must be transparent, so that voters and observers can see that at the beginning of the election there is no ballot box in them and that no other ballot box has been added, except those handed over by duly registered and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to observe all parts of the process. At night, volunteers count the votes under strict supervision, following certain procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Če bo najdba potrjena, se zaključi Allenovo osemletno iskanje ladje Musaši. Potem ko so izdelali karto morskega dna, so razbitino našli s pomočjo naprave ROV. Allen, eden najbogatejših Zemljanov, naj bi velik del svojega premoženja vložil v raziskovanje morja in se podal na misijo iskanja Musaši, ki izvira iz njegovega vseživljenjskega zanimanja za vojno.
mt: If the find is confirmed, it will end Allen's eight-year search for the ship Musashi. After creating a map of the ocean floor, they found the wreck using a ROV. Allen, one of the richest people on Earth, is said to have invested a large part of his fortune in ocean exploration and embarked on a search for Musashi, which originates from his lifelong interest in war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Televizijska poročila kažejo, kako se iz tovarne vali bel dim. Lokalne oblasti opozarjajo ljudi, ki prebivajo v bližini tovarne, naj ostanejo v zaprtih prostorih, izklopijo klimatske naprave in ne pijejo vode iz pipe. Po poročanju japonske jedrske agencije so v obratu zaznali radioaktivni cezij in jod. Oblasti menijo, da vse kaže na to, da so vsebniki z uranskim gorivom morda počili in se razlili.
mt: Television reports show white smoke billowing from the plant. Local authorities warn people living near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and not drink water from the tap. According to reports from the Japanese nuclear agency, they have detected radioactive cesium and iodine in the air. Authorities say all this points to the possibility that the uranium fuel rods may have melted and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
