src: "Dr. Tony Moll je tuberkulozo, ki je odporna na številna zdravila (XDR-TB), odkril v južnoafriški pokrajini KwaZulu-Natal. V intervjuju je dejal, da nova različica ""vzbuja precejšnjo skrb in nelagodje zaradi izjemne stopnje smrtnosti."" Nekateri bolniki so bakterijo lahko staknili v bolnišnici, meni dr. Moll, in vsaj dva sta bila zdravstvena delavca v bolnišnici. V enem letu lahko okužena oseba okuži od 10 do 15 bližnjih stikov. Delež XDR-TB v celotni skupini ljudi s tuberkulozo se že vedno zdi nizek; 6000 od skupno 330.000 okuženih v kateremkoli času v Južni Afriki."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll has discovered a drug-resistant strain of tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province. In an interview, he said the new strain ""causes considerable concern and dismay because of its high mortality rate."" Some patients may have contracted the bacteria in the hospital, Dr. Moll says, and at least two were health care workers in the hospital. In one year, an infected person can infect up to 10 to 15 close contacts. The proportion of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis has always seemed low; 6000 out of a total of 330,000 infected in South Africa at any given time."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen je sistem, za katerega FAA trdi, da bi letalom omogočil letenje na krajših progah in s tem prihranil na milijone galon goriva letno ter znižal emisije ogljika. Uporablja tehnologijo na podlagi satelitov in ne stare tehnologije na podlagi stacionarnih radarjev, s čimer kontrolorjem letenja omogoča, da natančneje določijo lokacijo zračnega plovila in pilotom podajo natančnejše informacije.
mt: NextGen is a system for which the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly on shorter routes and thus save millions of gallons of fuel annually and reduce carbon emissions. It uses technology based on satellites and not the old technology based on stationary radars, allowing air traffic controllers to more accurately determine the location of an aircraft and pilots to receive more accurate information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Zgodovinarji so kritizirali pretekle politike FBI zaradi usmerjanja sredstev na primere, ki so bili lahko rešljivi, predvsem na primere ukradenih vozil, z namenom izboljšanja uspešnosti agencije. Kongres je iniciativo proti nespodobnosti začel financirati v proračunskem letu 2005 in določil, da mora FBI za odraslo pornografijo nameniti 10 agentov.
mt: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases that could have been solved, especially stolen vehicles, with the intent of improving the agency's success rate. Congress initiated a move against impropriety in the fiscal year 2005 budget and required that FBI allocate 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C Gripen je strmoglavilo na pristajalno stezo okoli 9.30 ure po lokalnem času (0230 UTC) in eksplodiralo, zato je letališče zaprto za komercialne lete. Pilota so identificirali kot majorja Dilokrita Pattaveeja. Lokalni mediji poročajo, da se je gasilsko vozilo letališča med odzivom prevrnilo.
mt: 9.30 local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, so the airport closed to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Major Dilokrit Pattaveej. Local media report that the airport fire truck overturned while responding.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Brzezinski je bil v 60. letih prejšnjega stoletja svetovalec Johna F. Kennedyja in kasneje del administracije Lyndona B. Johnsona. Med volitvami leta 1976 je Carterju svetoval glede zunanje politike, nato pa med leti 1977 in 1981 opravljal nalogo svetovalca za nacionalno varnost (NSA), kjer je nasledil Henryja Kissingerja. Kot svetovalec državne varnosti je pomagal Carterju pri svetovnih diplomatskih zadevah, na primer sporazumu iz Camp Davida leta 1978; normaliziranju ameriško-kitajskih odnosov v poznih sedemdesetih letih 20. stoletja, iranski revoluciji, ki je vodila v iransko krizo s talci leta 1979, in sovjetski invaziji Afganistana leta 1979.
mt: Brzezinski was a foreign policy adviser to John F. Kennedy in the 1960s and later served in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then from 1977 to 1981 served as National Security Advisor, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As Carter's National Security Advisor, he helped Carter with world diplomatic matters, such as the Camp David Accords of 1978; normalization of U.S.–China relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis of 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Brzezinski je bil v 60. letih prejšnjega stoletja svetovalec Johna F. Kennedyja in kasneje del administracije Lyndona B. Johnsona. Med volitvami leta 1976 je Carterju svetoval glede zunanje politike, nato pa med leti 1977 in 1981 opravljal nalogo svetovalca za nacionalno varnost (NSA), kjer je nasledil Henryja Kissingerja. Kot svetovalec državne varnosti je pomagal Carterju pri svetovnih diplomatskih zadevah, na primer sporazumu iz Camp Davida leta 1978; normaliziranju ameriško-kitajskih odnosov v poznih sedemdesetih letih 20. stoletja, iranski revoluciji, ki je vodila v iransko krizo s talci leta 1979, in sovjetski invaziji Afganistana leta 1979.
mt: Brzezinski was a foreign policy adviser to John F. Kennedy in the 1960s and later served in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then from 1977 to 1981 served as National Security Advisor, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As Carter's National Security Advisor, he helped Carter with world diplomatic matters, such as the Camp David Accords of 1978; normalization of U.S.–China relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis of 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Bobek, ki se je rodil v hrvaški prestolnici Zagrebu, je zaslovel, ko je igral za beograjski Partizan. Pridružil se jim je leta 1945 in z njimi ostal do leta 1958. V času, ko je bil član ekipe, je dosegel 403 golov in 468 nastopov. Do danes za klub še nihče ni zbral toliko nastopov ali zadel več golov kot Bobek. Leta 1995 je bil izglasovan za najboljšega igralca v zgodovini Partizana.
mt: Bobek, who was born in the Croatian capital Zagreb, became famous when he played for the Belgrade Partizan. He joined them in 1945 and remained with them until 1958. During the time he was a member of the team, he scored 403 goals and 468 appearances. To date, no one has collected as many appearances or scored as many goals for the club as Bobek. In 1995 he was elected the best player in the history of Partizan.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae je vrsta, ki spada v družino Dromaeosauridae in je sorodnica velociraptorja. Ta pernata, toplokrvna ujeda naj bi hodila pokončno po dveh nogah in imela kremplje kot velociraptor. Njegov drugi krempelj je bil večji, iz česar izvira tudi njegovo poimenovanje Hesperonychus, ki pomeni ""zahodni krempelj""."
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species belonging to the family Dromaeosauridae and is a relative of velociraptor. This feathered, warm-blooded predator is believed to have walked bipedally on two legs and had claws like velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, from which its name Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw," is derived."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Zabave ob prvi obletnici para, ki se je poročil lani, se je udeležilo najmanj 100 ljudi. Uradna prireditev ob obletnici je bila predvidena kasneje, so povedale oblasti. Par se je lani poročil v Teksasu in prišel v Buffalo, da bi praznoval s prijatelji in sorodniki. 30-letni soprog, rojen v Buffalu, je bil eden od štirih žrtev streljanja, njegova žena pa ni bila poškodovana.
mt: 100 people attended the celebration of the first anniversary of the couple, who married last year. The official celebration of the anniversary was scheduled later, officials said. The couple married in Texas last year and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old groom, born in Buffalo, was one of four victims of a shooting, his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Ko se je Luno pokvarila in so jo močni vetrovi in valovi vrgli v valobran, je imela na krovu 120–160 kubičnih metrov goriva. S helikopterji so rešili dvanajst članov posadke in razen zlomljenega nosu, ni bilo drugih poškodb. 100-metrska ladja je bila na poti, da bi prevzela običajen tovor gnojila, in oblasti so se sprva ustrašile, da bi lahko plovilo razlilo tovor.
mt: When the Moon was damaged and strong winds and waves threw it into a breakwater, it had 120–160 cubic meters of fuel on board. Twelve members of the crew were rescued by helicopters and except for a broken bow, there were no other injuries. The 100-meter ship was on its way to take on its usual cargo of fertilizer, and authorities were initially concerned that the vessel could have spilled its cargo.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Med Vautierjeve dosežke zunaj področja režije šteje gladovna stavka leta 1973 proti, po njegovemu prepričanju, politični cenzuri. Francoska zakonodaja se je spremenila. Z aktivizmom se je začel ukvarjati pri 15. letih, ko se je med II. svetovno vojno pridružil Francoskemu odporniškemu gibanju. Zapise o sebi je leta 1998 strnil v knjigo. V 60. letih 20. stoletja se je vrnil v na novo osamosvojeno Alžirijo, da bi učil režiranje filmov.
mt: Among Vautier's achievements outside the realm of directing is his 1973 strike against, in his opinion, political censorship. French law changed. With activism he began at age 15, joining the French Resistance during World War II. He wrote his autobiography in 1998, which was published in 2000. In the 1960s, he returned to newly independent Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Pogreba v Rimu se je udeležilo več kot štiri milijone ljudi. Prisotnih je bilo toliko ljudi, da vsem nikakor ni bilo mogoče zagotoviti dostopa do pogreba na trgu Sv. Petra. Da bi ljudje lahko spremljali slovesnost, so na različnih mestih po Rimu postavili več velikih televizijskih ekranov. Za podobne postavitve, ki si jih je ogledalo veliko ljudi, so poskrbeli tudi v številnih drugih italijanskih mestih in drugod po svetu, še posebno na Poljskem.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. So many people wanted to attend the funeral on St. Peter's Square that it was impossible to provide access to everyone. To allow people to watch the event, large television screens were set up in various places in Rome. Similar setups, which were viewed by many people, were also set up in many other Italian cities and elsewhere in the world, especially in Poland.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Glede na poročila je stanovanje na ulici Macbeth Street eksplodiralo zaradi uhajanja plina. Uslužbenec plinskega podjetja je prišel na kraj dogodka potem, ko je sosed klical zaradi uhajanja plina. Ko je uslužbenec prispel, je stanovanje eksplodiralo. O hujših poškodbah niso poročali, vendar pa je najmanj pet oseb, ki so bile takrat prisotne na kraju eksplozije, potrebovalo zdravljenje zaradi znakov šoka. V stanovanju ni bilo nikogar. Takrat je bilo s tega območja evakuiranih skoraj 100 prebivalcev.
mt: According to reports, a house on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.  A gas company employee came to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.  When the employee arrived, the house exploded.  There were no reports of serious injuries, but at least five people who were present at the scene of the explosion required treatment for signs of shock.  No one was in the house at the time.  Almost 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Življenje sta izgubila 25-letni Nicholas Alden in 21-letni Zachary Cuddeback. Vozil je Cuddeback. Edgar Veguilla je bil ranjen v roko in čeljust, Kristoffer Schneider pa je na koncu potreboval rekonstrukcijsko operacijo obraza. Ukino orožje se ni sprožilo, ko ga je uperjal v glavo petega moža. Schneider trpi za stalno bolečino, slep je na eno oko, manjka mu del lobanje, njegov obraz pa so ponovno sestavili iz titana. Schneider je pričal prek video povezave iz baze USAF v svoji domovini.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was driving. Edgar Veguilla was injured in the hand and jaw, Kristoffer Schneider eventually needed a facial reconstruction operation. The gun did not fire when he pointed it at the head of the fifth man. Schneider suffers from chronic pain, he is blind in one eye, he is missing part of his skull, and his face was rebuilt with titanium. Schneider testified via video link from his home base in the USAF.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Na olimpijske igre naj bi se vrnila tako golf kot ragbi. Mednarodni olimpijski komite je na današnjem sestanku izvršnega odbora v Berlinu glasoval o vključiti športov. Med petimi drugimi športi, ki bi se lahko uvrstili na olimpijske igre, sta bila izbrana ragbi, natančneje ragbijska zveza, in golf. Na program olimpijskih iger so poskušali uvrstiti skvoš, karate in športe na rolerjih in rolkah, kot tudi bejzbol in softball, ki so ju iz OI izločili leta 2005. Glasovanje mora ratificirati še celotni Mednarodni olimpijski komite na svojem oktobrskem srečanju v Kopenhagnu.
mt: Golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee voted on the inclusion of sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Among the five other sports that could be included in the Olympic Games are rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf. The IOC has attempted to include squash, karate, roller sports and roller skating, as well as baseball and softball, which were removed from the Olympics in 2005. The vote must be ratified by the entire International Olympic Committee at its October meeting in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 24. septembra 1759 je Arthur Guinness podpisal 9000 let trajajočo zakupno pogodbo za pivovarno St James' Gate v Dublinu na Irskem. 250 let kasneje je podjetje Guinness zraslo v svetovno podjetje, ki letno obrne 10 milijard evrov (14,7 milijard USD).
mt: 24 September 1759 Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease for the St James' Gate brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, the Guinness company had grown into a global company, turning over 10 billion euros (14.7 billion USD) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Potrjeno je, da je sev ptičje gripe, ki je smrtonosen za človeka, H5N1, okužil mrtvo divjo raco, ki so jo v ponedeljek našli v močvirju blizu Lyona na vzhodu Francije. Francija je sedma država Evropske unije, ki jo je prizadel ta virus; takoj za Avstrijo, Nemčijo, Slovenijo, Bolgarijo, Grčijo in Italijo. Domnevni primeri H5N1 na Hrvaškem in Danskem še niso potrjeni.
mt: It has been confirmed that the strain of bird flu, which is fatal to humans, H5N1, infected a dead wild boar found Monday in a marsh near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh European Union country to be hit by this virus; immediately after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Pripadnike mirovne misije OZN, ki so na Haiti prišli po potresu 2010, se krivi za širjenje bolezni, ki se je začela v bližini četnega kampa. Po navedbah tožbe sanacija odpadkov iz taborišča ZN ni bila ustrezna, kar je povzročilo vnos bakterij v pritok reke Artibonite, ki je ena največjih na Haitiju. Do prihoda čet se Haiti že od 19. stoletja ni soočal s težavami, povezanimi s to boleznijo. Haitski inštitut za pravosodje in demokracijo se je skliceval na neodvisne raziskave, ki kažejo, da so nepalske mirovne sile ZN bolezen nevede prenesle na Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, strokovnjakinja ZN za to bolezen, je izjavila, da so izbruh verjetno povzročili mirovniki.
mt: Members of the UN peacekeeping mission that came to Haiti after the 2010 earthquake are blamed for spreading the disease that began near the UN camp. According to the complaint, the UN waste cleanup at the camp was not adequate, which caused the entry of bacteria into the Artibonite River, one of the largest in Haiti. Haiti had not faced problems related to this disease since the 19th century. The Haitian Institute of Justice and Democracy cited independent research showing that the UN peacekeepers from Nepal brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, said the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Irska vlada poudarja, da mora parlamentarna zakonodaja nujno popraviti situacijo. ""Tako iz javnozdravstvenega kot pravosodnega vidika je pomembno, da zakonodaja čimprej stopi v veljavo,"" je povedal vladni predstavnik. Minister za zdravje je izrazil zaskrbljenost tako za dobrobit posameznikov, ki izkoriščajo začasno zakonitost zadevnih substanc, kot za obsodbe, povezane z drogami, ki so bile izrečene od začetka veljavnosti zdaj neustavnih sprememb."
mt: "The Irish government stresses that parliamentary legislation must urgently address the situation. "From a public health and justice perspective, it is important that legislation is brought into force as soon as possible,"" a government spokesman said. The health minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals who are exploiting the temporary legality of the substances in question, and for the sentences, linked to drugs, that have been handed down since the start of the now unconstitutional changes."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "Christopher Garcia, tiskovni predstavnik policijske uprave Los Angelesa, je povedal, da je domnevni moški kršitelj v postopku preiskave zaradi motenja posesti, in ne zaradi vandalizma. Znak ni bil fizično poškodovan; preoblikovali so ga s pomočjo črnih ponjav, okrašenih z znaki za mir in srcem, da so spremenili ""O"" v mali ""e""."
mt: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect is in custody for trespassing, not vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; they changed the ""O"" to a small ""e"" with black markers, adorned with peace signs and hearts."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno je znani kontroverzni učitelj angleščine, ki je poučeval pod okriljem šol Modern Education in King's Glory, ter trdil, da je imel na vrhuncu kariere 9000 učencev. V svojih zapiskih je uporabil besede, ki so se nekaterim staršem zdele precej grobe, v razredu pa naj bi se izražal prostaško. Šola Modern Education ga je obtožila, da je brez dovoljenja tiskal velike oglase na avtobuse in lagal, da je glavni učitelj angleščine. Pred tem so mu očitali tudi kršitev avtorskih pravic, vendar ni bil obtožen. Nekdanji študent je povedal, da je »pri urah uporabljal sleng, učil zmenkarske spretnosti pri pisanju sporočil in bil kot prijatelj študentov«.
mt: Karno was a controversial English teacher who taught under the auspices of the Modern Education and King's Glory schools, and claimed to have had 9,000 students at the height of his career. In his notes he used words that some parents found too crude, and in class he was said to have expressed himself vulgarly. The Modern Education school accused him of printing large posters on buses without permission and lying that he was the main English teacher. Previously he was also accused of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said he "used slang in class, taught students how to write messages and was like a friend to students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Nekdanji filipinski policist je hongkonške turiste vzel za talce tako, da je ugrabil njihov avtobus v Manili, prestolnici Filipinov. Rolando Mendoza je s svojo puško M16 streljal v turiste. Nekaj talcev so rešili in do zdaj je potrjenih vsaj šest mrtvih. Šest talcev, vključno z otroki in starejšimi, so spustili prej, tako kot tudi filipinske fotografe. Fotografi so zamenjali starejšo gospo, ki je morala na stranišče. Mendozo so ustrelili.
mt: A former Philippine policeman took Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Some hostages were rescued and at least six deaths are confirmed. Six hostages, including children and elderly, were released earlier, as well as a Filipino photographer. The photographer replaced an elderly woman who had to go to the bathroom. Mendoza was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazilija je največja rimokatoliška država na Zemlji, pri čemer je rimokatoliška cerkev od nekdaj nasprotovala legalizaciji istospolnih porok v tej državi. Narodni kongres Brazilije je legalizacijo pretresal 10 let in takšne civilne poroke so trenutno dovoljene le v Rio Grande do Sul. Prvotni osnutek zakona je pripravila nekdanja županja Sao Paula, Marta Suplicy. Po spremembah je predlagana zakonodaja zdaj v rokah Roberta Jeffersona. Protestniki upajo, da bodo zbrali 1,2 milijona podpisov peticije, ki jo bodo narodnemu kongresu predstavili v novembru.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Catholic Church has always opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in this country. The Brazilian National Congress has been debating the legalization for 10 years, and such civil unions are currently only allowed in Rio Grande do Sul. The original draft of the bill was prepared by former mayor of Sao Paulo, Marta Suplicy. After amendments, the proposed legislation is now in the hands of Robert Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures on a petition they will present to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Po petih minutah predvajanja je prihrumel veter, približno minuto kasneje je veter dosegal 70 km/h ... nato je začel padati dež, a tako silovito in obilno, da je zbadal po koži kot bi padale šivanke, potem se je z neba usula toča, ljudi je zagrabila panika in kričali so in bežali vsepovprek. Izgubil sem sestro in njeno prijateljico, na poti sem naletel na dva invalida na vozičkih, ljudje so kar skakali čez njiju in ju porivali,"" je rekel Armand Versace."
mt: "After five minutes of broadcasting, the wind picked up, about a minute later the wind reached 70 km/h... then it started raining, but so heavily and abundantly, that it stung like needles, then lightning struck from the sky, people panicked and screamed and ran everywhere. I lost my sister and her friend, on the way I met two invalids on wheelchairs, people were just jumping over them and kicking them," said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Napovedovalci pravijo, da se bo nevihta, ki se nahaja približno 645 milj (1040 km) zahodno od otokov Cape Verde, verjetno razkropila, preden bi lahko ogrozila katero koli kopensko območje. Fred, katerega vetrovi trenutno dosegajo hitrost 105 milj na uro (165 km/h), se pomika proti severozahodu. Fred je najmočnejši tropski ciklon, ki je kadar koli prodrl tako daleč na jug in vzhod Atlantika, odkar obstajajo satelitske slike, in šele tretji največji zabeleženi orkan vzhodno od poldnevnika 35° zahodne zemljepisne dolžine.
mt: Forecasters say the storm, which is about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, is likely to dissipate before it could threaten any landmass. Fred, whose winds currently reach 105 miles per hour (165 km/h), is moving toward the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever to have reached so far south and east in the Atlantic, since satellite imagery began, and only the third largest recorded east of 35° west longitude.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Standard 802.11n deluje tako na frekvenci 2,4 GHz kot 5,0 GHz. Zaradi tega bo povratno združljiv s standardi 802.11a, 802.11b in 802.11g, v kolikor bo imela osnovna postaja dvojni radio. Hitrosti standarda 802.11n so občutno večje od hitrosti njegovih predhodnikov z največjo teoretično prepustnostjo 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates on both the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands. Therefore it will be backward compatible with standards 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has a dual radio. The speeds of 802.11n are significantly higher than those of its predecessors with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Nosilec zlate olimpijske medalje bi moral plavati 100 in 200 m prosto ter tri štafete na igrah Commonwealtha, vendar je bila zaradi njegovih težav njegova telesna pripravljenost vprašljiva. Ni smel vzeti zdravil, ki jih potrebuje za lajšanje bolečin, saj so ta na igrah prepovedana.
mt: 100 and 200 m freestyle and three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but his physical fitness was questionable due to his problems. He could not take the drugs he needed to ease the pain, as they are banned at the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Mednarodni zemljevid potresov Ameriškega seizmološkega urada v preteklem tednu ni pokazal nobenega potresa na Islandiji. Islandski urad za meteorologijo v zadnjih 48 urah na območju Hekle prav tako ni zabeležil nobene potresne dejavnosti. Do znatne potresne dejavnosti, ki je vodila v fazno spremembo, je prišlo 10. marca na severovzhodni strani kaldere na vrhu vulkana. Poročali so o temnih oblakih ob vznožju gore, ki niso povezani z nobeno vulkansko dejavnostjo. Oblaki so povzročili nekaj dvoma, ali je dejansko prišlo do izbruha ali ne.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's earthquake map for the past week did not show any earthquakes in Iceland. The Icelandic Meteorological Office did not record any seismic activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. Significant seismic activity leading to a phase change occurred on March 10 on the northeast side of the crater on the top of the volcano. Reports were made of dark clouds at the base of the mountain, not associated with any volcanic activity. The clouds caused some doubt as to whether an eruption actually occurred or not.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Mednarodni zemljevid potresov Ameriškega seizmološkega urada v preteklem tednu ni pokazal nobenega potresa na Islandiji. Islandski urad za meteorologijo v zadnjih 48 urah na območju Hekle prav tako ni zabeležil nobene potresne dejavnosti. Do znatne potresne dejavnosti, ki je vodila v fazno spremembo, je prišlo 10. marca na severovzhodni strani kaldere na vrhu vulkana. Poročali so o temnih oblakih ob vznožju gore, ki niso povezani z nobeno vulkansko dejavnostjo. Oblaki so povzročili nekaj dvoma, ali je dejansko prišlo do izbruha ali ne.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's earthquake map for the past week did not show any earthquakes in Iceland. The Icelandic Meteorological Office did not record any seismic activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. Significant seismic activity leading to a phase change occurred on March 10 on the northeast side of the crater on the top of the volcano. Reports were made of dark clouds at the base of the mountain, not associated with any volcanic activity. The clouds caused some doubt as to whether an eruption actually occurred or not.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Brezpilotni lunarni orbiter Chandrayaan-1 je izstrelil svojo udarno lunarno sondo (MIP), ki je površje Lune preletela s hitrostjo 1,5 kilometra na sekundo (3000 milj/uro) in uspešno strmoglavila v bližini Luninega južnega pola. Lunarna sonda na krovu ni prevažala le treh pomembnih znanstvenih inštrumentov, pač pa je bila na vseh njenih stranicah upodobljena tudi državna zastava Indije.
mt: The Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter successfully deployed its impact lunar probe (MIP), which flew over the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3000 mph) and crash-landed near the lunar south pole. The lunar probe carried only three important scientific instruments, but the flag of India was depicted on all of its sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Prvi primeri te bolezni v tej sezoni so bili zabeleženi konec julija. Bolezen prenašajo prašiči, nato pa jo komarji prenesejo na ljudi. Izbruh je indijsko vlado prisili da sprejme ukrepe, kot so napotitev lovcev na prašiče v hudo prizadetih območjih, razdelitev več tisoč zaves proti komarjem in škropljenje s pesticidi. Vlada je obljubila tudi več milijonov vial cepiva proti encefalitisu, kar bo zdravstvenim agencijam pomagalo, da se pripravijo na prihodnje leto. Za letos načrtovana dobava cepiv v zgodovinsko najbolj prizadeta območja je bila preložena zaradi pomanjkanja sredstev in nizke prioritete v primerjavi z drugimi boleznimi.
mt: The first cases of the disease this season were reported at the end of July. The disease is carried by pigs, then by mosquitoes to people. The outbreak forced the Indian government to take measures such as instructing hunters to shoot pigs in hard-hit areas, distributing millions of mosquito nets and spraying pesticides. The government also promised millions of doses of encephalitis vaccine, which will help health agencies prepare for next year. The planned delivery of vaccines to the most affected areas this year was delayed due to lack of funds and low priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Predlog spremembe sta že leta 2011 sprejela oba domova. Do spremembe v tem zakonodajnem postopku je prišlo, ko je drugi stavek najprej izbrisal predstavniški dom, nato pa ga je v podobni obliki v ponedeljek potrdil senat. Neuspešnost drugega stavka, ki predlaga prepoved sklepanja civilnih zakonskih zvez istospolnih partnerjev, bi lahko v prihodnje odprla vrata za civilne zakonske zveze. Po koncu tega postopka bo HJR-3 v letu 2015 ali 2016 ponovno preučilo naslednje izvoljeno zakonodajno telo, da se bo postopek nadaljeval.
mt: 2011, both houses of the state legislature passed the proposal. The second sentence was first struck down by the House, then in a similar form approved by the Senate on Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which would have banned civil marriage of same-sex couples, could open the door to civil marriage in the future. After the conclusion of this process, HJR-3 will be reexamined by the next elected legislative body in 2015 or 2016 to continue the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Panamski dokumenti"" je krovni izraz, ki zajema približno deset milijonov dokumentov panamske odvetniške družbe Mossack Fonseca, ki so pricurljali v medije spomladi leta 2016. Iz dokumentov je bilo razvidno, da je štirinajst bank pomagalo premožnim strankam skriti na milijarde ameriških dolarjev premoženja, da bi se izognili davkom in drugim omejitvam. Britanski časnik The Guardian je namignil, da Deutsche Bank upravlja slabo tretjino od 1200 slamnatih podjetij, ki so jih uporabili za ta namen. Po celem svetu so izbruhnili protesti, izvedli so več kazenskih pregonov, voditelja islandske ter pakistanske vlade pa sta odstopila."
mt: """Panama Papers"" is the collective term for about ten million documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which leaked to the media in the spring of 2016. The documents revealed that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of American dollars of assets to avoid taxes and other restrictions. The British newspaper The Guardian hinted that Deutsche Bank manages poorly a third of 1200 shell companies that were used for this purpose. Protests broke out all over the world, several criminal investigations were carried out, and the leaders of the Icelandic and Pakistani governments both resigned."
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Letalske nesreče so v Iranu pogoste, saj tako za civilne kot vojaške operacije uporabljajo zastarelo floto, ki je slabo vzdrževana. Zaradi mednarodnih sankcij niso mogli kupiti novih letal. V začetku tega tedna je strmoglavil policijski helikopter, pri čemer so tri osebe umrle, še tri pa so bile poškodovane. Prejšnji mesec je Iran doživel najhujšo letalsko katastrofo zadnjih let, v kateri je strmoglavilo letalo, namenjeno v Armenijo, pri čemer je umrlo vseh 168 oseb na krovu. V istem mesecu je še en letalski prevoznik prekoračil pristajalno stezo in trčil v zid ter pri tem ubil sedemnajst ljudi.
mt: Air crashes are common in Iran, as both civilian and military operations use an aging fleet that is poorly maintained. Due to international sanctions they could not buy new aircraft. Earlier this week a police helicopter crashed, killing three people and injuring three others. Last month Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years, when a plane bound for Armenia crashed, killing all 168 people on board. In the same month a commercial airliner overshot the runway and crashed into a wall, killing seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Raziskovalna skupina za Irak je svoje poročilo predstavila danes ob 12.00 po GMT. V njem svarijo, da ne more nihče zagotoviti, da bodo ukrepi v Iraku zaustavili sektaško bojevanje, porast nasilja ali pogrezanje v kaos. Poročilo se začne s pozivom k odprti razpravi in oblikovanju dogovora v Združenih državah o politiki do Bližnjem vzhodu. Poročilo je skoraj v vseh pogledih zelo kritično do trenutne politike izvršne oblasti do Iraka in poziva k takojšnji spremembi usmeritve. Prvo od 78 priporočil pravi, da je treba novo diplomatsko pobudo sprožiti še pred koncem letošnjega leta, da bi meje Iraka zavarovali pred sovražnimi posegi in da bi znova vzpostavili diplomatske odnose z njenimi sosedami.
mt: The Iraq Study Group's report was presented today at 12:00 GMT. In it, they warn that no one can guarantee that the actions in Iraq will stop sectarian violence, the rise of violence or the descent into chaos. The report begins with a call for an open debate and the formation of an agreement in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The report is almost entirely critical of the current administration's policy towards Iraq and calls for an immediate change of direction. The first of 78 recommendations says that a new diplomatic initiative should be launched before the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders from hostile actions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Po poročanju Anse ""je bila policija zaskrbljena zaradi naročenih umorov nekaterih pomembnih akterjev, ki bi lahko zanetili odprto vojno za nasledstvo. Policija je povedala, da je bil Lo Piccolo na močnejšem položaju, saj je bil v Palermu desna roka Provenzana, zaradi velike izkušenosti pa je pridobil spoštovanje starejše generacije šefov, ki so sledili Provenzanovemu pravilu, da je treba ostati kar se da neopažen in hkrati jačati svojo mrežo moči. Prevlado nad temi šefi je prevzel Provenzano, ko je pod vodstvom Riine končal vojno z državo, ki je leta 1992 vzela življenja mafijskih križarjev Giovannija Falconeja in Paola Borsellina."""
mt: "According to the Ansa, the police were concerned about the planned murders of some important actors who could have ignited an open war for succession. The police said that Lo Piccolo was in a stronger position, as he was in Palermo the right hand of Provenzano, and because of his experience he had gained the respect of the older generation of bosses who followed Provenzano's rule that one should remain as much as possible unnoticed and at the same time strengthen his network of power. Provenzano took over the leadership of these bosses when he, under the leadership of Riina, ended the war with the state, which in 1992 took the lives of mafia knights Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Japonski judoist Hitoši Saito, dobitnik dveh zlatih olimpijskih kolajn, je umrl v starosti 54 let. Uraden vzrok smrti je bil rak intrahepatalnega žolčevoda. Umrl je v torek v Osaki. Saito je bil nekdaj olimpijski in svetovni prvak, pred smrtjo pa je bil tudi na čelu komiteja vsejaponske judo federacije.
mt: 2-time Olympic gold medalist judoist Hitoši Saito died at the age of 54. The official cause of death was bile duct cancer. He died on Tuesday in Osaka. Saito was once an Olympic and world champion, and before his death was also the head of the committee of the All-Japan Judo Federation.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Med potovanjem se je Iwasaki pogosto znašel v težavah. Oropali so ga pirati, v Tibetu ga je napadel stekel pes, v Nepalu je pobegnil poroki in bil aretiran v Indiji.
mt: During his travels, Iwasaki often found himself in trouble. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella je izgubil nadzor nad avtomobilom in dirko zaključil že kmalu po začetku. Njegov moštveni kolega Fernando Alonso je vodil večino dirke, vendar jo je zaključil takoj po postanku v boksu, verjetno zaradi slabo postavljenega sprednjega desnega kolesa. Michael Schumacher je svojo dirko zaradi poškodb na vzmetenju med številnimi boji med dirko zaključil malo za Alonsom.
mt: 2005 World Drivers' Champion Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and finished the race shortly after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but finished it shortly after a pit stop, likely due to a poorly placed front right wheel. Michael Schumacher finished his race due to damage to his suspension during numerous battles throughout the race, just behind Alonso.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella je izgubil nadzor nad avtomobilom in dirko zaključil že kmalu po začetku. Njegov moštveni kolega Fernando Alonso je vodil večino dirke, vendar jo je zaključil takoj po postanku v boksu, verjetno zaradi slabo postavljenega sprednjega desnega kolesa. Michael Schumacher je svojo dirko zaradi poškodb na vzmetenju med številnimi boji med dirko zaključil malo za Alonsom.
mt: 2005 World Drivers' Champion Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and finished the race shortly after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but finished it shortly after a pit stop, likely due to a poorly placed front right wheel. Michael Schumacher finished his race due to damage to his suspension during numerous battles throughout the race, just behind Alonso.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: V zadnjih treh mesecih so iz stavbe Central Booking izpustili več kot 80 aretirancev, ne da bi bili uradno obtoženi. Aprila letos je sodnik Glynn izdal začasno prepoved približevanja objektu, da bi izsilil izpust tistih, ki so jih pridržali v priporu za več kot 24 ur in jih ni zaslišal komisar. Komisar določi varščino, če je ta odobrena, in uradno potrdi obtožnico, ki jo je vložil policist ob prijetju. Obtožnica je vnesena v državni računalniški sistem, kjer je primer mogoče spremljati. Obravnava je hkrati tudi datum, ko lahko osumljenec uveljavlja pravico do hitrega sojenja.
mt: In the last three months, more than 80 detainees have been released from the Central Booking building without being formally charged. In April this year, Judge Glynn issued a temporary restraining order to prevent approaching the building to force the release of those who had been detained for more than 24 hours and not heard by the commissioner. The commissioner determines the bail, if approved, and officially confirms the charge filed by the police officer at the arrest. The charge is entered into the state computer system, where the case can be tracked. The hearing is also the date when the defendant can assert the right to speedy trial.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin je povedal tudi, da so se oblasti odločile preklicati drugi krog volitev, da bi Afganistanu prihranile stroške in varnostno tveganje ponovnih volitev. Diplomati so povedali, da so v afganistanski ustavi našli dovolj nejasnosti, da bi lahko drugi krog opredelili kot nepotrebnega. To ni skladno s prejšnjimi poročili, kjer je bilo zapisano, da bi bil preklic drugega kroga neustaven.
mt: Lodin also said that the authorities had decided to cancel the second round of elections to save costs and security risks of a second round. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguities in the Afghan constitution to declare the second round unnecessary. This is not consistent with previous reports, where it was written that the cancellation of the second round would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Odkar se je Pakistan leta 1947 osvobodil izpod britanske oblasti, je pakistanski predsednik določil ""politične agente"", ki vodijo območja FATA, in imajo skoraj popolno avtonomno oblast nad območji. Ti agenti so odgovorni za zagotavljanje vladnih in sodniških služb v skladu z 247. členom pakistanske ustave."
mt: "Since Pakistan gained independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed "political agents" who govern the FATA areas and have almost complete autonomous authority over them. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services in accordance with Article 247 of the Pakistani constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Film z Ryanom Goslingom in Emmo Stone v glavnih vlogah je bil nominiran v vseh glavnih kategorijah. Gosling in Stonova sta bila nominirana za najboljšega igralca oziroma igralko. Ostale nominacije vključujejo nominacije za najboljši film, režiserja, kinematografijo, kostumografijo, filmsko montažo, izvirno glasbo, produkcijo, montažo zvoka, mešanje zvoka in izvirni scenarij. Dve pesmi iz filma, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) in City of Stars, sta bili nominirani za najboljšo izvirno pesem. Studio Lionsgate je dobil 26 nominacij – več kot katerikoli drugi studio.
mt: 2016 Academy Awards Nominations
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Po poročanju NHK je jedrska elektrarna Kašivazaki Kariva v prefekturi Niigata obratovala normalno. Elektroenergetsko podjetje Hokuriku je poročalo, da zaradi potresa ni bilo škode in da so v jedrski elektrarni Sika ustavili delovanje reaktorjev številka 1 in 2. Po poročanju naj bi v tej regiji 9400 domov ostalo brez vode in približno 100 brez elektrike. V prizadetih območjih je bilo poškodovanih nekaj cest in prekinjen železniški promet, letališče Noto v prefekturi Išikava je še vedno zaprto.
mt: NHK reports the Kashivazaki Kariva nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally.  The Hokuriku Electric Power Company reported that there was no damage and that the reactors at the Shika nuclear power plant in the same prefecture had been shut down.  According to reports, 9,400 homes in the area were without water and about 100 without electricity.  Roads and rail service were disrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture was still closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Razkrili so, da se bo dokument nanašal na spor glede meja, ki jih želi Palestina osnovati na mejah pred vojno, ki je potekala na Srednjem vzhodu leta 1967. Druge obravnavane teme naj bi zajemale prihodnje stanje Jeruzalema, ki v obeh državah velja za svetega, in problematiko Doline reke Jordan. Izrael zahteva stalno vojaško prisotnost v dolini še deset let po podpisu sporazuma, Palestinska oblast pa je pristala le na pet let tovrstne prisotnosti.
mt: It was revealed that the document will deal with the dispute over borders, which Palestine wants to establish on the borders before the war that took place in the Middle East in 1967. Other issues to be discussed will include the future status of Jerusalem, which is holy to both states, and the problem of the Jordan Valley. Israel demands permanent military presence in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, while the Palestinian Authority agreed only on five years of such presence.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Ma se je rodil v Hongkongu in študiral na newyorški univerzi in harvardski pravni fakulteti, v preteklosti pa je bil tudi imetnik ""zelene karte"" za ameriškega stalnega prebivalca. Hsieh je med volitvami namignil, da bi lahko Ma v času krize pobegnil iz države. Hsieh je tudi dejal, da ima fotogenični Ma več sloga kot vsebine. Kljub tem obtožbam je Ma z lahkoto zmagal s političnim programom, ki zagovarja tesnejše vezi s celinsko Kitajsko."
mt: "He was born in Hong Kong and studied at New York University and Harvard Law School, and was also a holder of a "green card" for a permanent U.S. resident. Hsieh had hinted during the campaign that Ma could flee the country during a crisis. Hsieh also said that the photogenic Ma had more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma easily won the political program that advocates closer ties with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Potem ko je postalo jasno, da številne družine iščejo pravno pomoč za boj proti prisilnim izselitvam, je 20. marca v pravnem centru skupnosti East Bay potekal sestanek za žrtve stanovanjske prevare. Ko so se najemniki začeli pogovarjati o tem, kar se jim je zgodilo, je večina vpletenih družin nenadoma ugotovila, da je Carolyn Wilson iz Oakland Housing Authority ukradla njihove varščine in pobegnila iz mesta. Najemniki menijo, da bi lahko izselitev grozila še 40 družinam, odkar so izvedeli, da policija OHA preiskuje tudi druge javne stanovanjske prostore v Oaklandu, ki bi lahko bili vpleteni v stanovanjsko goljufijo.
mt: After it became clear that many families were seeking legal help in fighting forced evictions, a March 20 meeting at the East Bay Community Law Center was held for victims of housing fraud. When tenants began discussing what had happened to them, many of the involved families suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the Oakland Housing Authority had stolen their rent checks and fled the city. Tenants believe that the eviction could threaten up to 40 families, since they learned that the Oakland police OHA are investigating other public housing spaces in Oakland that could be involved in housing fraud.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Keselowski na koncu dirke z 2250 točkami ostaja vodilni dirkač v svetovnem prvenstvu. S sedem točkami zaostanka je Johnson drugi z 2.243. Po tretji dirki Hamlin zaostaja za dvajset točk in ima prednost petih točk pred Bowyerjem. Kahne in Truex ml. sta na petem oziroma šestem mestu, prvi z 2.220 in drugi z 2.207 točkami. Prvo deseterico dirkaškega prvenstva zaokrožujejo Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth in Harvick, do konca sezone pa so še štiri dirke.
mt: Keselowski finishes the race with 2250 points and remains the leader in the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series. Johnson is second with 2243 points, seven points behind. Hamlin is third with 2223 points, five points ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex Jr. are fifth and sixth, respectively, with 2220 and 2207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick complete the top ten, with four races remaining in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: To naj bi bilo petič v zgodovini, da so bili ljudje priča kemično potrjenemu marsovskemu materialu, ki je padel na Zemljo. Od približno 24.000 meteoritov, za katere je znano, da so padli na Zemljo, jih le okoli 34 potrjeno izvira iz Marsa. Od teh kamnov jih petnajst pripisujejo meteorni plohi iz lanskega julija. Nekateri kamni, ki so Zemlji zelo redki, se prodajajo za od 11.000 do 22.500 ameriških dolarjev na unčo, kar je približno desetkrat več, kot je cena zlata.
mt: This is believed to be the largest petition in history to witness chemically proven Martian material falling to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 meteorites known to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 are known to originate from Mars. Of these rocks, fifteen are attributed to the meteorite shower of last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are selling for $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, ki se je po sedemkratni zmagi na prvenstvu formule 1 leta 2006 upokojil, naj bi zamenjal poškodovanega Felipeja Masso. Brazilec je utrpel hude poškodbe glave v nesreči med veliko nagrado Madžarske leta 2009. Massa bo odsoten najmanj do konca sezone 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired after seven titles, is reported to be replacing Felipe Massa, who was seriously injured in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Schumacher, ki se je po sedemkratni zmagi na prvenstvu formule 1 leta 2006 upokojil, naj bi zamenjal poškodovanega Felipeja Masso. Brazilec je utrpel hude poškodbe glave v nesreči med veliko nagrado Madžarske leta 2009. Massa bo odsoten najmanj do konca sezone 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired after seven titles, is reported to be replacing Felipe Massa, who was seriously injured in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Do sedaj je lahko AOL premikal in razvijal trg IM v lastnem tempu, saj je znotraj Združenih držav močno razširjen. Tak dogovor bi lahko pomenil konec takšne svobode. Skupno število vseh uporabnikov storitev Yahoo! in Microsoft bo konkurenčno številu strank AOL.
mt: AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, as it is widely spread within the United States. Such an agreement could mean the end of such freedom. The total number of all Yahoo! and Microsoft services users will be competitive with the number of AOL subscribers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Avtomobilska bomba, ki jo je včeraj razneslo na policijski postaji v mestu Gaziantep v Turčiji, je ubila dva policista in poškodovala več kot dvajset drugih oseb. Iz guvernerjevega urada so sporočili, da je bilo devetnajst ranjencev policistov. Policija je dejala, da za napad sumijo domnevnega pripadnika Islamske države (ISIL).
mt: A car bomb that exploded yesterday at a police station in the city of Gaziantep in Turkey killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. From the governor's office they reported that nineteen police officers were injured. Police said they suspect a suspected member of the Islamic State (ISIL) for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Nekdanji guverner Massachusettsa Mitt Romney je zmagal na torkovih volitvah za izbiro predsedniškega kandidata republikanske stranke na Floridi, saj je dobil več kot 46 odstotkov glasov. Nekdanji govorec predstavniškega doma ZDA, Newt Gingrich, je bil z 32 odstotki na drugem mestu. Florida deluje po načelu, da zmagovalec prejme vse, zato je dodelila vseh petdeset delegatov Romneyju in ga s tem potisnila na vodilno mesto v boju za predstavnika republikanske stranke.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's presidential nomination on Tuesday in Florida, winning more than 46 percent of the vote. Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich was second with 32 percent. Florida operates on a winner-take-all basis, awarding all 50 delegates to Romney and pushing him into the lead in the race for the Republican Party's presidential nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Nekdanji govorec predstavniškega doma Newt Gingrich, teksaški guverner Rick Perry in kongresnica Michele Bachmann so končali na četrtem, petem oziroma šestem mestu. Po razglasitvi rezultatov je Gingrich pohvalil Santoruma, Romneyu pa je namenil zgolj ostre besede, saj so zaradi njega v Iowi predvajali negativne oglase za kampanjo proti Gingrichu. Perry je dejal, da se bo ""vrnil v Texas, da oceni rezultate nocojšnjih strankarskih volitev, da vidi, če v tej bitki zanj obstaja pot naprej"", vendar pa je pozneje rekel, da bo vztrajal v bitki in 21. januarja sodeloval na predvolilnem zborovanju v Južni Karolini. Bachmannova, ki je avgusta zmagala na slamnatih volitvah, se je odločila, da ne bo nadaljevala kampanje."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished fourth, fifth or sixth. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but told Romney only harsh words, as he was responsible for the negative ads aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry said he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucuses, to see if there is a path forward for him"", but later said he would continue the fight and participate in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the straw poll in August, decided not to continue her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "Spletno mesto postaje oddajo opisuje kot ""radijsko gledališče stare šole z novim in nezaslišanim piflarskim preobratom"". Oddajo so sprva predvajali izključno na spletnem mestu dolgoletnega spletnega radia TogiNet Radio, posvečenega pogovornim radijskim oddajam. Konec leta 2015 je TogiNet vzpostavil hčerinsko postajo AstroNet Radio. V oddaji so prvotno sodelovali amaterski glasovni igralci iz vzhodnega Teksasa."
mt: "The website describes the station as ""a radio playhouse of the old school with a new and unheard of piffling about"". The show was originally broadcast exclusively on the long-running TogiNet Radio website, dedicated to talk radio. At the end of 2015, TogiNet established a sister station, AstroNet Radio. The show originally featured amateur voice actors from East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Mumbajski napadalci, ki so s seboj prinesli granate in avtomatska orožja, so 26. novembra 2008 pripluli s čolnom in napadli več krajev, vključno z natrpano železniško postajo Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus in slavnim hotelom Taj Mahal. David Headly je s poizvedovanjem in zbiranjem informacij 10 strelcem iz pakistanske militantne skupine Laskhar-e-Taiba pomagal omogočiti operacijo. Napad je privedel do zelo napetih odnosov med Indijo in Pakistanom.
mt: 26 November 2008, Mumbai attackers, who brought grenades and automatic weapons with them, boarded a boat and attacked several locations, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley helped 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba with reconnaissance and information gathering. The attack led to very tense relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
