src: Dovoljenja je treba rezervirati vnaprej. Če želite v Sireni ostati čez noč, morate imeti dovoljenje. Sirena je edina čuvajska postojanka, ki poleg kampiranja ponuja nastanitev s skupnimi sobami in toplimi obroki. La Leona, San Pedrillo in Los Patos ponujajo samo kampiranje brez možnosti prehrane. Parkirna dovoljenja lahko pridobite neposredno v naravovarstveni nadzorni postaji v Puertu Jiménezu, vendar ne sprejemajo kreditnih kartic. Služba upravljanja parka (MINAE) ne izdaja dovoljenj za prenočitev več kot mesec dni pred predvidenim prihodom. CafeNet El Sol ponuja storitev rezervacij za pristojbino v višini 30 ameriških dolarjev ali 10 ameriških dolarjev za dnevno prepustnico; podrobnosti so na voljo na njihovi strani Corcovado.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. If you want to stay overnight in Sirena, you must have a permit. Sirena is the only ranger station that, in addition to camping, offers accommodation with shared rooms and hot meals. La Leon, San Pedrillo and Los Patos only offer camping without the option of food. Parking permits can be obtained directly at the park management office in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards. The park management service (MINAE) does not issue permits for overnight stays more than a month before the expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of $30 or $10 per day for a pass; details are available on their Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Popotovanje z nahrbtnikom na smučeh: tej dejavnosti rečemo tudi turno smučanje ali smučarsko pohodništvo. Čeprav navadno ne vsebuje elementov teh disciplin, je podobno turnemu alpskemu smučanju ali pohodništvu, ki se izvajata na strmem terenu in zahtevata veliko trše smuči in čevlje. Smučarsko pot si predstavljajte kot podobno pohodniško pot. V dobrih vremenskih pogojih boste lahko pokrili večje razdalje kot s hojo – redko pa boste dosegli hitrost turnega smučanja brez težkega nahrbtnika in urejenih stez.
mt: Backpacking on skis: This activity is also called ski touring or ski hiking. Although it does not usually involve elements of these disciplines, it is similar to ski touring or hiking, which are performed on steep terrain and require sturdy skis and boots. Imagine a ski trail as similar to a hiking trail. In good weather conditions, you can cover greater distances than by walking – but rarely will you reach the speed of downhill skiing without a heavy backpack and groomed trails.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Šok ob vrnitvi se zgodi prej kot kulturni šok (ni tako dolgega obdobja medenih tednov), traja dlje in je lahko resnejši. Popotniki, ki so se zlahka prilagodili novi kulturi, se včasih zelo težko ponovno prilagodijo svoji lastni kulturi. Ko se po bivanju v tujini vrnete domov, ste se prilagodili novi kulturi in izgubili nekatere navade iz svoje domače kulture. Ko ste bili prvič v tujini, so bili ljudje verjetno potrpežljivi in razumevajoči, saj so vedeli, da se morajo popotniki navaditi na novo državo. Morda ljudje ne pričakujejo, da morajo biti potrpežljivi in razumevajoči tudi potniki, ki se vračajo domov.
mt: The shock of returning home happens before the cultural shock (not so long a period of honeyed months), lasts longer and can be more serious. Travelers who easily adapted to the new culture may find it difficult to re-adapt to their own culture. When you return home after living abroad, you have adapted to the new culture and lost some of the habits of your home culture. When you were first abroad, people were probably tolerant and understanding, as they knew that travelers had to adapt to the new country. Maybe people don't expect travelers to be tolerant and understanding when they return home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Losi (znani tudi kot kanadski jeleni) po naravi niso agresivni, ampak se bodo branili, če zaznajo nevarnost. Če ljudje losa ne dojemajo kot potencialno nevarnega, se mu lahko preveč približajo in se tako izpostavijo nevarnosti.
mt: Elk (also known as Canadian moose) are not naturally aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. If people do not perceive an elk as a potential threat, they may get too close and thus expose themselves to danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Zaradi vročine lahko popotniki dobijo privide, ki dajejo vtis vode (ali drugih stvari). Ti prividi so lahko nevarni, če jih popotnik poskuša doseči, saj s tem izgublja dragoceno energijo in preostalo vodo. Še tako vroča puščava se lahko ponoči izjemno ohladi. Brez toplih oblačil obstaja resna nevarnost za podhladitev.
mt: Because of the heat, travelers can have hallucinations that give the impression of water (or other things). These hallucinations can be dangerous if the traveler tries to reach them, as they lose valuable energy and remaining water. The desert can be exceptionally cold at night, even with hot clothes. Without warm clothes, there is a serious risk of hypothermia.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Dominikanska Republika (špansko: República Dominicana) je karibska država, ki zavzema vzhodno polovico otoka Hispaniola, katerega si deli s Haitijem. Poleg belih peščenih plaž in hribovite pokrajine se ta država ponaša tudi z najstarejšim evropskim mestom v obeh Amerikah, ki je danes del Santa Dominga. Otok so prvi naselili Taini in Karibi. Karibi so bili aravaško govoreče ljudstvo, ki je prišlo okoli leta 10.000 pr. n. š. V le nekaj letih po prihodu evropskih raziskovalcev je populacija Tainov drastično upadla zaradi španskih osvajalcev. Po podatkih Frayja Bartoloméja de las Casasa (Tratado de las Indias) so španski osvajalci med letom 1492 in 1498 ubili približno 100.000 Tainov.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. In addition to white sandy beaches and hilly terrain, this country also boasts the oldest European city in both Americas, which is now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first settled by the Taíno and Carib people. The Caribs were an Arawakan-speaking people who arrived around 10,000 BC. In just a few years after the arrival of European explorers, the population of the Taíno drastically declined due to Spanish conquistadors. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), the Spanish conquistadors killed about 100,000 Taíno between 1492 and 1498.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Dominikanska Republika (špansko: República Dominicana) je karibska država, ki zavzema vzhodno polovico otoka Hispaniola, katerega si deli s Haitijem. Poleg belih peščenih plaž in hribovite pokrajine se ta država ponaša tudi z najstarejšim evropskim mestom v obeh Amerikah, ki je danes del Santa Dominga. Otok so prvi naselili Taini in Karibi. Karibi so bili aravaško govoreče ljudstvo, ki je prišlo okoli leta 10.000 pr. n. š. V le nekaj letih po prihodu evropskih raziskovalcev je populacija Tainov drastično upadla zaradi španskih osvajalcev. Po podatkih Frayja Bartoloméja de las Casasa (Tratado de las Indias) so španski osvajalci med letom 1492 in 1498 ubili približno 100.000 Tainov.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. In addition to white sandy beaches and hilly terrain, this country also boasts the oldest European city in both Americas, which is now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first settled by the Taíno and Carib people. The Caribs were an Arawakan-speaking people who arrived around 10,000 BC. In just a few years after the arrival of European explorers, the population of the Taíno drastically declined due to Spanish conquistadors. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), the Spanish conquistadors killed about 100,000 Taíno between 1492 and 1498.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "Smučarski športi na snegu, ki vključujejo smučanje in deskanje na snegu, so priljubljeni športi, ki vsebujejo spuščanje po zasneženem terenu s smučmi ali desko, pritrjeno na stopala. Smučanje je poglavitna aktivnost popotnikov s številnimi privrženci, ki jim včasih rečejo ""potepuški smučarji"", saj ves dopust načrtujejo okoli smučanja na določeni lokaciji. Predstava o smučanju je zelo stara – jamske slike z upodobitvijo smučarjev segajo vse v leto 5000 pr. n. št.! Alpsko smučanje kot šport sega najmanj v 17. stoletje, leta 1861 pa so Norvežani v Avstraliji odprli prvi rekreativni smučarski klub."
mt: "Downhill skiing and snowboarding are popular sports that involve sliding down a snow-covered slope on skis or a snowboard attached to the feet. Skiing is the primary activity of backcountry travelers with many enthusiasts who are sometimes called "backcountry skiers," as they plan their entire vacation around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old – cave paintings depicting skiers date back to 5000 BC! Alpine skiing as a sport dates back at least to the 17th century, and in 1861 Norwegians in Australia opened the first recreational ski club."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Vzhodnoafriški otoki ležijo v Indijskem oceanu ob vzhodni obali Afrike. Madagaskar je daleč največji in ločen kontinent, če upoštevamo njegov živalski ter rastlinski svet. Manjši otoki so po večini neodvisne države ali povezani s Francijo in znani kot luksuzna obmorska letovišča. Arabci so na to ozemlje pripeljali tudi islam, ki se je močno uveljavil na Komorih in otoku Mayotte. Začetek evropskega vpliva in kolonizacije sega v 15. stoletje, ko je portugalski raziskovalec Vasco da Gama našel pot iz Evrope v Indijo okoli Afrike.
mt: The East African islands lie in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is far the largest and isolated continent, if we consider its animal and plant world. Smaller islands are mostly independent states or connected to France and known as luxury coastal resorts. Arabs brought Islam to this land, which has become firmly established on the Comoros and the island of Mayotte. The beginning of European influence and colonization dates back to the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found a route from Europe to India around Africa.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Po tradiciji je treba veliko noč prebedeti na kakšnem izpostavljenem mestu in dočakati sončni vzhod. Za to tradicijo seveda obstajajo krščanske teološke razlage, vendar je to lahko tudi predkrščanski pomladni obred in obred plodnosti. V bolj tradicionalnih cerkvah med velikonočnim koncem tedna v soboto ponoči pogosto poteka velikonočno bdenje, kjer se ob polnoči zborovanje pogosto spremeni v praznovanje Kristusovega vstajenja.
mt: By tradition, one must spend a lot of night watching for the sunrise at some exposed place and await the sunrise. For this tradition there are of course Christian theological explanations, but it can also be a pre-Christian spring ritual and fertility ritual. In more traditional churches during the Easter weekend on Saturday night often takes place an Easter vigil, where the midnight service often changes to celebrate the resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ekvador od državljanov Kube zahteva, da pred vstopom v državo na mednarodnih letališčih ali mejnih kontrolnih točkah pridobijo garantno pismo. To pismo mora legalizirati ekvadorsko Ministrstvo za zunanje zadeve, prav tako pa mora izpolnjevati določene pogoje. Te zahteve so namenjene temu, da se zagotovi organiziran migracijski pretok med državama. Državljani Kube, ki imajo zeleno karto Združenih držav Amerike, morajo za pridobitev izvzetja te zahteve obiskati ekvadorski konzulat. Vaš potni list mora biti veljaven še najmanj 6 mesecev po datumu potovanja. Za dokazovanje trajanja bivanja je potrebna povratna vozovnica/vozovnica za nadaljevanje potovanja.
mt: Ecuador is requiring Cuban citizens to obtain a guaranty letter before entering the country at international airports or border control points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, as well as meet certain requirements. These requirements are intended to ensure organized migration between countries. Cuban citizens with a green card of the United States must visit the Ecuadorian consulate to obtain the waiver of these requirements. Your travel document must be valid for at least 6 months after the date of travel. To prove the duration of residence, a return ticket/continuation ticket is required.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Očala so lahko v drugi državi cenejša, še posebej v državah z nizkimi dohodki, kjer so stroški dela nižji. Razmislite o možnosti, da očesni pregled opravite doma, še posebej če ga pokriva zavarovanje, recept pa lahko vzamete s seboj ter ga koristite drugje. Prestižne znamke okvirjev, ki so na voljo na takšnih območjih, so lahko dvojno problematične; nekateri okvirji so lahko ponaredki, tisti pristni uvoženi pa so lahko dražji kot doma.
mt: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in other countries, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower. Consider the possibility of having an eye exam at home, especially if it is covered by insurance, and taking the prescription with you to use elsewhere. Prestigious frame brands available in such areas can be doubly problematic; some frames may be fakes, and those that are genuine imported may be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Uradna valuta Falklandskih otokov je falklandski funt (FKP), njegova vrednost pa je določena enakovredno z vrednostjo britanskega funta (GBP). Gotovino je mogoče zamenjati v edini banki na otokih, ki se nahaja v Stanleyju nasproti trgovine FIC West. Britanske funte sprejemajo praktično na vseh otokih, na Stanleyju pa večinoma sprejemajo tudi kreditne kartice in ameriške dolarje. Na zunaj ležečih otokih verjetno ne bodo sprejemali kreditnih kartic, vendar pa bodo morda sprejeli britansko in ameriško valuto; pri lastnikih se vnaprej pozanimajte, kateri način plačila je sprejemljiv. Falklandsko valuto je zunaj otokov skoraj nemogoče zamenjati, zato gotovino zamenjajte, še preden odidete z otokov.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), whose value is set equal to that of the British pound (GBP).  Cash can be exchanged at the only bank on the islands, located in Stanley opposite the FIC West store.  British pounds are accepted almost everywhere on the islands, and British and American currency is accepted in Stanley.  Credit cards are accepted in Stanley, but may not be accepted on the outlying islands; check with the owner which method of payment is accepted.  Falkland pounds are almost impossible to exchange outside the islands, so exchange your cash before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Večina templjev ima letni festival v obdobju od konca novembra do sredine maja, ki se razlikuje glede na letni koledar posameznega templja. Večina tempeljskih festivalov se praznuje kot del obletnice templja, rojstnega dneva božanstva, ki tam biva, ali katerega koli drugega večjega dogodka, ki je povezan s templjem. Tempeljski festivali v Kerali so zelo zanimivi za ogled, vključno z običajno povorko okrašenih slonov, tempeljskim orkestrom in drugimi slovesnostmi.
mt: Most temples have an annual festival in the period from late November to mid-May, which varies according to the temple's annual calendar. Most temple festivals are celebrated as part of the temple's anniversary, the birthday of the deity who resides there, or any other major event associated with the temple. Temple festivals in Kerala are very interesting to watch, including the usual procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other ceremonies.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Očiten način, kako leteti v prvem oziroma poslovnem razredu, je, da za privilegij globoko sežete v žep (ali bolje, da vaše podjetje to stori namesto vas). To pa ni poceni: praviloma lahko pričakujete, da boste za poslovni razred plačali do štirikrat več kot za ekonomski razred in za prvi razred enajstkrat več! Na direktnih letih od točke A do točke B na splošno nima smisla niti iskati popustov za sedeže v poslovnem ali prvem razredu. Letalske družbe dobro vedo, da obstaja določena osrednja skupina potnikov, ki so pripravljeni veliko plačati za privilegij, da nekam prispejo hitro in udobno, ter to temu ustrezno tudi zaračunajo.
mt: The way to fly in the first or business class is to dig deep into your pocket (or better, have your company do it instead of you). This usually means you will pay up to four times more for business class than for economy class and eleven times more for first class! On direct flights from point A to point B, there is no point in looking for discounts for seats in business or first class. Airlines know that there is a certain core group of passengers who are willing to pay a lot for the privilege of getting somewhere quickly and comfortably, and they charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Letalske družbe, kot so Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways in Turkish Airlines, so močno razširile svoje storitve po Afriki ter ponujajo povezave s številnimi glavnimi afriškimi mesti po bolj konkurenčnih cenah kot druge evropske letalske družbe. Družba Turkish Airlines od leta 2014 leti v 39 destinacij v 30 afriških državah. Če vam ostane nekaj časa za potovanje, preverite, koliko znaša skupna cena prevoza v Afriko v primerjavi s ceno prevoza okoli sveta. Ne pozabite všteti dodatnih stroškov naknadnih vizumov, odhodnih taks, kopenskega prevoza itd, za vse kraje izven Afrike.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa and offer connections to many major African cities at more competitive prices than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines has flown to 39 destinations in 30 African countries since 2014. If you have some time to spare, check how much it costs to fly to Africa compared to the cost of flying around the world. Don't forget to factor in additional visa fees, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all destinations outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Kupovanje hrane v supermarketih je ponavadi najcenejši način, kako se nahraniti. Če kuhanje ni mogoče, pa so možnosti omejene na že pripravljeno hrano. Supermarketi ponujajo vse bolj raznoliko izbiro že pripravljene hrane. V nekaterih lahko najdete celo mikrovalovno pečico ali druge načine za gretje hrane. V nekaterih državah ali vrstah trgovin je vsaj ena restavracija v samem objektu, kjer vlada sproščeno vzdušje in imajo dostopne cene.
mt: Buying food at supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to feed yourself. If cooking is not possible, the options are limited to prepared food. Supermarkets offer increasingly diverse selection of prepared food. In some you can even find a microwave oven or other means of heating food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one restaurant in the same building, where the atmosphere is relaxed and have affordable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Različici francoščine, ki ju uporabljajo v Belgiji in Švici, se rahlo razlikujeta od francoščine, ki jo govorijo v Franciji, a sta ji dovolj podobni, da se njihovi govorci medsebojno razumejo. Posebno sistem številčenja v francosko govoreči Belgiji in Švici ima nekaj posebnosti, po katerih se razlikuje od francoščine, ki jo govorijo v Franciji, različna pa je tudi izgovorjava nekaterih besed. Vendar pa so se vsi francosko govoreči Belgijci in Švicarji v šoli verjetno učili standardne francoščine, zato bi vas morali razumeti, tudi če uporabljate standardni francoski sistem številčenja.
mt: The French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland is slightly different from the French spoken in France, but they are close enough that their speakers can understand each other. The system of counting in French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland has some peculiarities that distinguish it from the French spoken in France, and some words are also pronounced differently. However, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss are likely to have learned standard French in school, so you should be understood even if you use the standard French counting system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Prevoznine v primeru smrti v družini, ki nekoliko znižajo strošek poti na pogreb tik pred zdajci, ponuja le še nekaj letalskih družb. To med drugimi ponujajo tudi letalske družbe Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa za lete, ki odhajajo iz Združenih držav ali Kanade, in WestJet. V vsakem primeru morate za rezervacijo neposredno poklicati letalsko družbo.
mt: Funeral expenses in the event of death in a family, which slightly reduce the cost of the funeral just before the coffin, offer only a few airlines. This among others offer airlines Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights departing from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. In each case, you must call the airline directly to reserve.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Uporaba aplikacij za navigacijo GPS na pametnem telefonu je morda najlažji in najpriročnejši način navigacije izven domovine. S tem lahko prihranite denar, ki bi ga porabili za nove zemljevide za GPS, samostojno napravo GPS ali izposojo naprave pri podjetju za izposojo avtomobilov. Če na telefonu nimate podatkovne povezave ali je telefon nedosegljiv, bo storitev omejena ali nedostopna.
mt: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone is probably the easiest and most convenient way to navigate outside your home country. This can save you money that you would spend on new GPS maps, a standalone GPS device, or renting a GPS device from a car rental company. If your phone does not have data connectivity or is out of range, the service will be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Otok in divje živali na Galapaških otokih si je najbolje ogledati z ladjo, tako kot je to storil Charles Darwin leta 1835. Po vodah Galapagosa pluje več kot 60 križark – ki glede na velikost sprejmejo od 8 do 100 potnikov. Večina ljudi opravi rezervacijo veliko vnaprej (saj so ladje na vrhuncu sezone običajno polne). Rezervacijo vsekakor opravite prek agencije, ki je specializirana za Galapagos in dobro pozna vse vrste ladij. Tako bo izbira ladje prilagojena vašim posebnim željam in/ali omejitvam.
mt: The best way to see the islands and wildlife of the Galapagos is by boat, as Charles Darwin did in 1835. There are more than 60 yachts cruising the waters of the Galapagos, accommodating from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the peak season). Book through an agency that specializes in Galapagos and knows all the boats well. This way your choice of boat will be tailored to your specific needs and/or limitations.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Igralnice se ponavadi zelo potrudijo, da jim gostje namenijo čim več časa in denarja. Oken in ur običajno ni, izhode pa je težko najti. Njihova ponudba navadno zajema hrano, pijačo in zabavne točke, s katerimi zabavajo obiskovalce in jih čim dlje zadržijo pri sebi. Na nekaterih lokacijah so alkoholne pijače vštete v ceno. Alkoholiziranost pa vpliva na presojo in dobri igralci na srečo vedo, kako pomembno je ostati trezen.
mt: Casinos typically go to great lengths to keep their guests as long as possible and spend as much money as possible. They usually do not have clocks or windows, and exits are difficult to find. Their offer usually includes food, drinks and entertainment points, with which they entertain visitors and keep them as long as possible. Some locations include alcoholic drinks in the price. Alcoholism, however, affects the assessment and good players know how important it is to stay sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Vsi samostalniki, poleg besede Sie za vi, se vedno začenjajo z veliko začetnico, tudi sredi povedi. To je pomemben način ločevanja nekaterih glagolov in predmetov. Poleg tega naj bi olajšalo tudi branje, čeprav je s tem pisanje nekoliko oteženo, ker je treba ugotoviti, ali je glagol oziroma pridevnik uporabljen v osnovni obliki.
mt: All nouns, except for the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way of distinguishing some verbs and nouns. In addition, it is said to facilitate reading, although it does make writing a bit more difficult, as one must determine whether a verb or adjective is used in its basic form.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: "V številnih krajih po svetu mahanje velja za prijazno gesto, ki pomeni ""zdravo"". V Maleziji, vsaj med Malezijci na podeželju, pa podobno kot gesta premikanja kazalca proti telesu v določenih Zahodnih državah pomeni ""pridi sem"", in bi se moralo uporabljati le za to. Podobno lahko britanski popotnik v Španiji mahanje v slovo z dlanjo obrnjeno proti tistemu, ki maha (namesto proti osebi, ki ji maha), zmotno razume kot kretnjo, ki ga kliče nazaj."
mt: "In many places around the world, waving is a friendly gesture that means "hello." In Malaysia, at least among Malaysians in the countryside, it means "come here" and should only be used for that. Similarly, a British traveler in Spain might misinterpret a wave with the palm of the hand turned toward the person waving (instead of toward the person being waved at) as a gesture that calls them back."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Ledeniki niso stabilni, ampak tečejo iz gore. Pri tem nastajajo razpoke, prelomi, ki jih lahko zastirajo snežni mostovi. Zidovi in strehe ledenih votlin se lahko vdrejo in zaprejo razpoke. Na robu ledenikov se lahko odlomijo ogromni kosi, ki padejo in se morda tudi odbijejo ali zakotalijo daleč od roba.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but they are flowing out of the mountain. In the process, cracks and breaks are formed, which can be closed by snow bridges. Walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and close cracks. On the edge of glaciers, huge pieces can fall and bounce or roll far from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma je turistično mesto na skrajnem vzhodu Demokratične republike Kongo blizu Ruande. Leta 2002 je bilo mesto Goma uničeno zaradi lave iz ognjenika Nyiragongo, ki je pokopala večino ulic in predvsem središče mesta. Čeprav je Goma dovolj varna, je treba izlete izven Gome raziskati, da se razume spopade, ki trajajo v provinci Severni Kivu. To mesto je tudi izhodišče za vzpon na vulkan Nyiragongo in za nekaj najugodnejših možnosti za sledenje gorskim gorilam v Afriki. Po Gomi lahko potujete z bodo-bodo (taksi – motor). Za kratko vožnjo po običajni (lokalni) ceni boste odšteli okoli 500 kongovskih frankov.
mt: Goma is a tourist town on the far east of the Democratic Republic of the Congo near Rwanda. In 2002 the town of Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano, which buried most of the streets and especially the city center. Although Goma is safe enough, you should research your excursions outside of Goma to understand the conflicts that are ongoing in the province of North Kivu. This town is also the starting point for the ascent of the Nyiragongo volcano and for some of the most comfortable opportunities to track mountain gorillas in Africa. You can travel by boda-boda (taxi-motor) in Goma. For a short ride by the normal (local) price you will pay around 500 Congolese francs.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Za vsako taborjenje pod robom v Velikem kanjonu je potrebno dovoljenje za zadrževanje na podeželju. Dovoljenja so zaradi zaščite soteske omejena in so na voljo od 1. dne v mesecu naprej, štiri mesece pred mesecem začetka. Tako je dovolilnica za taborjenje v divjini za katerikoli začetni datum v maju na voljo od 1. januarja. Namestitvene kapacitete najbolj priljubljenih območij, kot je kamp Bright Angel v bližini Phantom Rancha, se običajno napolnijo že prvi dan po odprtju rezervacij. Omejeno število dovoljenj je rezervirano za prošnje na samem kraju, ki so na voljo na podlagi načela »kdor prej pride, prej dobi«.
mt: A permit is required for any overnight stay below the rim of the Grand Canyon. Permits are limited and available four months prior to the month of the start of the stay. Thus, a permit for camping in the backcountry for any start date in May is available from January 1. Capacity at the most popular sites, such as Bright Angel Campground near Phantom Ranch, is usually filled the first day after reservations open. A limited number of permits are reserved for requests on site, available on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Za vsako taborjenje pod robom v Velikem kanjonu je potrebno dovoljenje za zadrževanje na podeželju. Dovoljenja so zaradi zaščite soteske omejena in so na voljo od 1. dne v mesecu naprej, štiri mesece pred mesecem začetka. Tako je dovolilnica za taborjenje v divjini za katerikoli začetni datum v maju na voljo od 1. januarja. Namestitvene kapacitete najbolj priljubljenih območij, kot je kamp Bright Angel v bližini Phantom Rancha, se običajno napolnijo že prvi dan po odprtju rezervacij. Omejeno število dovoljenj je rezervirano za prošnje na samem kraju, ki so na voljo na podlagi načela »kdor prej pride, prej dobi«.
mt: A permit is required for any overnight stay below the rim of the Grand Canyon. Permits are limited and available four months prior to the month of the start of the stay. Thus, a permit for camping in the backcountry for any start date in May is available from January 1. Capacity at the most popular sites, such as Bright Angel Campground near Phantom Ranch, is usually filled the first day after reservations open. A limited number of permits are reserved for requests on site, available on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: V nekaterih hotelih lahko najdemo zapuščino zlate dobe parnih lokomotiv in prekooceanskih ladij; izpred druge svetovne vojne, in sicer iz 19. in začetka 20. stoletja. To so bili hoteli, v katerih so bivali bogataši in slavni takratnega časa, in so pogosto nudili odlične restavracije ter nočno življenje. Del njihovega karakterja so tudi staromodna notranja oprema, odsotnost najnovejših pripomočkov in nekakšna prefinjena postaranost. Običajno so sicer v zasebni lasti, včasih pa pod streho sprejmejo tudi voditelje držav in druge dostojanstvenike, ki pridejo na obisk. Popotniki s kupi denarja si lahko privoščijo let okrog sveta z vmesnimi postanki v katerem od teh hotelov.
mt: In some hotels you can find the legacy of the golden age of steam locomotives and transoceanic ships; from before the second world war, that is, from the 19th and early 20th centuries. These were hotels where the rich and famous of the time lived, and often offered excellent restaurants and nightlife. Part of their character is also old-fashioned interior equipment, absence of the latest amenities and some kind of refined aging. They are usually privately owned, sometimes under the roof they also welcome leaders of states and other dignitaries who come to visit. Tourists with a lot of money can afford a trip around the world with stops at any of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "Po zaslugi podvodnih kabelskih priključkov iz optičnih vlaken, ki so speljani do Evrope, in širokopasovnega satelita ima Grenlandija dobro povezljivost, kar dokazuje tudi dejstvo, da ima 93 % prebivalstva dostop do interneta. V vašem hotelu ali pri gostiteljih (če spite v penzionu ali zasebnem stanovanju) bodo najverjetneje imeli wifi ali osebni računalnik z internetno povezavo, poleg tega je v vseh naseljih na voljo kakšna spletna kavarna ali neka lokacija z javno dostopnim wifi-jem. Kot je že zgoraj omenjeno, je beseda ""eskim"" v Združenih državah še vedno sprejemljiva, za številne neameriške pripadnike arktičnega prebivalstva pa ima negativno konotacijo, posebno v Kanadi. Čeprav lahko Grenlandce kdaj slišite izgovoriti to besedo, je tujci ne smejo uporabljati. Prvotni prebivalci Grenlandije v Kanadi sami sebe imenujejo Inuiti, v Grenlandiji pa Kalaaleq (v množini Kalaallit) ali Grenlandci. Kriminala in na sploh sovraštva do tujcev na Grenlandiji skorajda ni. Tudi v mestih ni ""nevarnih sosesk"". Mrzlo vreme je bržkone edina resna nevarnost, ki preti nepripravljenim. Če se na Grenlandijo odpravite v hladnejšem delu leta (imejte v mislih, da bolj kot greste na sever, hladneje bo), morate s seboj nujno imeti dovolj topla oblačila. Zelo dolgi poletni dnevi lahko vodijo do nezadostnega spanca in povezanih zdravstvenih težav. Poleti se pazite tudi nordijskih komarjev. Čeprav ne prenašajo nobenih bolezni, so lahko zelo nadležni."
mt: "Thanks to underwater fiber-optic cables made of optical fibers, which are laid to Europe, and a broadband satellite, Greenland has good connectivity, which is also evidenced by the fact that 93% of the population has access to the Internet. In your hotel or at the inn (if you stay in a guesthouse or private apartment) they will most likely have Wi-Fi or a personal computer with Internet access, in addition, there are some Internet cafes or some location with public Wi-Fi in all settlements. As mentioned above, the word "Eskimo" is still acceptable in the United States, but for many non-American inhabitants of the Arctic, it has a negative connotation, especially in Canada. Although you can hear Greenlanders pronounce this word, foreigners should not use it. The original inhabitants of Greenland in Canada call themselves Inuit, in Greenland Kalaaleq (in the plural Kalaallit) or Greenlanders. Crime and especially hostility to foreigners in Greenland is almost non-existent. Even in cities there are no "dangerous neighborhoods". Cold weather is the only serious danger that threatens the unprepared. If you travel to Greenland in the colder part of the year (keep in mind that the colder you go north, the colder it will be), you must have warm clothes with you. Very long summer days can lead to insufficient sleep and related health problems. In the summer, be careful of Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not carry any diseases, they can be very annoying."
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Ta prostor je bil zgrajen kot atrij samostana iz 17. stoletja, od katerega je preživela samo zgradba Templo de San Diego. Zdaj se uporablja kot osrednji trg, kjer je vedno živahno, tako podnevi kot ponoči. Vrt obdaja več restavracij, v osrednjem paviljonu pa se popoldan in zvečer pogosto odvijajo brezplačni koncerti. Callejon del Beso (ulica poljuba). Dva balkona, ki ju ločuje zgolj 69 centimetrov, sta domovanje stare legende o ljubezni. Nekateri otroci vam bodo zgodbo povedali za le nekaj penijev.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium of a 17th century monastery, of which only the Templo de San Diego building remains. Now it is used as the central square, where it is always lively, both in the afternoon and at night. The garden surrounds several restaurants, and in the central pavilion free concerts are often held in the afternoon and evening. Callejon del Beso (kissing alley). Two balconies, separated by only 69 centimeters, are the home of an old legend of love. Some children will tell you the story for a few pennies.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Pohodništvo je aktivnost na prostem, ki zajema hojo v naravnem okolju, pogosto po pešpoteh. Dnevno pohodništvo vključuje razdalje od manj kot miljo do daljših razdalj, ki jih je mogoče prehoditi v enem dnevu. Celodnevni pohod po lahki pohodniški poti zahteva le malo priprav in udeležijo se ga lahko vse osebe z zmerno kondicijo. Družine z majhnimi otroki se bodo morale verjetno bolje pripraviti, a preživljanje dneva na prostem je prav tako lahko izvedljivo tudi z dojenčki in predšolskimi otroki.
mt: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on trails. Day hiking includes distances of less than a mile to longer distances that can be covered in a day. A day hike on a light hiking trail requires little preparation and can be undertaken by most people with a moderate level of fitness. Families with small children will need to prepare more, but surviving a day in the outdoors is also feasible with infants and preschool children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "Za Norveško so značilni strmi fjordi in doline, ki se kot bi odrezal umaknejo visoki, pretežno ravni planoti. Te planote se pogosto imenujejo ""vidde"", kar pomeni širok, odprt prostor brez dreves, brezmejno prostranstvo. V Rogalandu in Agderju so običajno poimenovane ""hei"", kar pomeni golo barje, večinoma pokrito z vreso."
mt: "Norway is characterized by steep fjords and valleys, which recede as if cut high, mostly flat plateaus. These plateaus are often called "vidde", which means a wide, open space without trees, limitless space. In Rogaland and Agder, they are usually named "hei", which means a bare moor, mostly covered with heather."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Vrhunec turistične sezone gorskih postaj je običajno v času indijskega poletja. Pozimi so drugače lepe in očarljive in veliko hribovskih letovišč dobro zasneži in tako ponujajo aktivnosti, kot so smučanje in deskanje.
mt: The peak of the ski resort season is usually during the Indian summer. In the winter, it is otherwise beautiful and charming and many mountain resorts are well snowed in and thus offer activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Ko boste prispeli do pristanišč, vam bo že marsikaj precej jasno. Spoznali boste ostale druge popotnike na čolnih, ki vam bodo predali svoje informacije. V bistvu boste lepili obvestila, da nudite pomoč, hodili po pristanišču, se pogovarjali z ljudmi med čiščenjem njihovih jaht, poskušali vzpostaviti stik z mornarji v baru itd. Poskusite govoriti s kar največ ljudmi. Čez nekaj časa vas bodo vsi poznali in vam bodo namignili, ali na kateri ladji iščejo nekoga.
mt: When you arrive at the dock, you will already have a lot of things clear. You will have recognized other fellow travelers on the boats, who will have given you their information. In essence, you will be sticking up notices that you offer help, walking around the dock, talking to people while cleaning their yachts, trying to establish contact with sailors in the bar etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while, everyone will know you and will point you to the boat where someone is looking for someone.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Po otoku Hongkong je poimenovan teritorij Hongkong in je glavna postojanka mnogih turistov. Vrsto zgradb, ki sestavlja silhueto mesta Hongkong, povezujejo z lesketajočim stolpčnim grafikonom, ki ga poudarja prisotnosti voda zaliva Victoria Harbour. Za najboljše poglede na Hong Kong pojdite z otoka in se odpravite na nasprotno obalo Kowloon. Urbani razvoj na hongkonških otokih je v veliki večini skoncentriran na ponovno priključenem ozemlju ob severni obali. To mesto so Britanski kolonialisti zavzeli kot svoje, zato je to dobro izhodišče za ogled ostankov kolonialne preteklosti tega območja, če vas to zanima.
mt: Hong Kong is a territory of Hong Kong and is the main port of entry for many tourists. A series of buildings that make up the skyline of Hong Kong are connected by a sleek, vertical graphic that emphasizes the presence of water in Victoria Harbour. For the best views of Hong Kong, go to the island and head to the opposite shore of Kowloon. Urban development on the Hong Kong islands is largely concentrated on the redeveloped land along the northern shore. This area was taken by British colonialists as their own, so it is a good starting point for viewing the remnants of colonial past of this area, if you are interested.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

Vrsto zgradb, ki sestavlja silhueto mesta Hongkong, povezujejo z lesketajočim stolpčnim grafikonom, ki ga poudarja prisotnosti voda zaliva Victoria Harbour. src: Stremena podpirajo jahačeva stopala in visijo na vsaki strani sedla. Jezdecu nudijo večjo stabilnost, vendar lahko predstavljajo tudi težavo z vidika varnosti, saj se lahko vanje ujamejo jezdečeve noge. Če konj jezdeca vrže s sebe in se jezdečevo stopalo ujame v streme, bi ga lahko konj v primeru pobega vlekel za sabo. Da bi zmanjšali to tveganje, lahko upoštevamo vrsto varnostnih ukrepov. Prvič, večina jahačev nosi jahalne škornje s peto in gladkim, dokaj ozkim podplatom. Nadalje imajo nekatera sedla, še posebej angleška sedla, varnostne zapahe, ki omogočajo, da usnjena stremenica odpade s sedla, če jo jahač med padcem potegne nazaj.
mt: The stirrups support the rider's feet and hang on each side of the saddle. They provide the rider with greater stability, but can also present a safety issue in that the rider's legs can become entangled in them. If the horse throws the rider off and catches the rider's foot in the stirrups, the horse could potentially drag the rider behind it in the event of a runaway. To reduce this risk, we can consider a number of safety measures. First, most riders wear riding boots with a five-inch heel and a smooth, relatively narrow sole. Secondly, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety straps that allow the leather stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if the rider pulls it back during a fall.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Mreža izmenjave gostoljubja je organizacija, ki popotnike povezuje z lokalnimi prebivalci v mestih, ki jih nameravajo obiskati. Za sprejem v mrežo je običajno potrebno zgolj izpolniti spletni obrazec, vendar pa nekatere mreže ponujajo ali zahtevajo dodatno potrditev. Seznam razpoložljivih gostiteljev je nato na voljo v tiskani obliki in/ali na spletu, včasih z referencami in ocenami drugih popotnikov. Kavčanje je nastalo januarja 2004, potem ko je računalniški programer Casey Fenton našel poceni let na Islandijo, vendar ni imel kje bivati. Študentom tamkajšnje univerze je poslal e-poštno sporočilo in prejel neverjetno veliko ponudb za brezplačno nastanitev.
mt: The hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers with local residents in the cities they intend to visit. To join the network, it is usually only necessary to fill out a web form, but some networks offer or require additional verification. A list of available hosts is then available in print and/or online, sometimes with references and ratings from other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004, when computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland, but did not know where to stay. He sent an email to students at the local university and received an incredible amount of offers for free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Hostli so primarno namenjeni mladim – tipičen gost je star od 20 do 29 let – pogosto pa se v njih znajdejo tudi starejši. Družine z otroki so redek prizor, nekateri hostli pa jim vendarle omogočajo bivanje v zasebnih sobah.
mt: Hostels are primarily intended for young people – the typical guest is aged between 20 and 29 years – but families with children are a rare sight, and some hostels do allow them to stay in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Metanje bumeranga je priljubljena spretnost, ki si je želi naučiti veliko turistov. Če se želite naučiti, kako vreči bumerang, da se vrne k vam, se prepričajte, da imate bumerang, primeren za vračanje. Večina bumerangov, ki so na voljo v Avstraliji, se v bistvu ne vrača. Za začetnike je najbolje, da jih ne poskušajo metati v vetrovnem
mt: Throwing boomerangs is a popular skill that many tourists want to learn. If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang so that it comes back to you, make sure you have a boomerang that is suitable for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia, in fact, do not return. For beginners, it is best not to try to throw them in windy conditions.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Indonezijska hrana je splošno poimenovanje za široko paleto tamkajšnjih jedi, ki jih najdemo po vsej državi, ki ponuja kar 17.000 otokov. Vendar pojem brez dodatnih označevalnikov večinoma pomeni hrano, ki izvira iz osrednjih in vzhodnih predelov glavnega otoka Jave. Za javansko kuhinjo, ki je zdaj razširjena po vsem arhipelagu, je značilna vrsta preprosto začinjenih jedi, pri čemer so prevladujoči okusi, ki jih Javanci obožujejo, arašidi, čiliji, sladkor (zlasti javanski kokosov sladkor) in razne aromatične začimbe.
mt: Indonesian cuisine is a general term for the many styles of food from the Indonesian islands, which span a wide geographical area with multiple cultures. The term is used to refer to the various local cuisines across the Indonesian islands. The specific foods and flavors of a particular region are different from the cuisines of the other regions. Indonesian cuisine is greatly diverse, in part because Indonesia is composed of several thousand native ethnic and linguistic groups. Almost all cuisines of Indonesia have many spices, such as cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg, which gives Indonesian food its own character.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Besedi infekcijski in nalezljiv imata različen pomen, če slučajno ne poznate zdravstvenega žargona. Infekcijska bolezen je tista, ki jo povzroča patogen, denimo virus, bakterija, glivica ali drugi paraziti. Nalezljiva bolezen je bolezen, ki se zlahka prenaša, če se oseba nahaja v bližini okužene osebe. Številne vlade zahtevajo, da se obiskovalci ob vstopu v državo oziroma prebivalci ob izstopu iz države cepijo proti različnim boleznim. Te zahteve so pogosto lahko odvisne od tega, katere države je potnik obiskal oziroma jih želi obiskati.
mt: The words infectious and contagious have different meanings, if you don't know medical jargon. An infectious disease is one caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other parasite. A contagious disease is one that is easily transmitted, if a person is in close proximity to an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering the country or residents leaving the country to be vaccinated against various diseases. These requirements are often dependent on which countries a traveler has visited or wishes to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Ponudniki osebnih VPN (navideznih zasebnih omrežij) so izvrsten način, kako se izogniti političnemu cenzuriranju in komercialnemu geografskemu filtriranju naslovov IP. Zmogljivejši so od spletnih posredniških strežnikov, saj preusmerijo ves spletni promet, ne samo http. Običajno nudijo višjo pasovno širino in kakovostnejšo storitev. Poleg tega so tudi šifrirani, zato so bolje zaščiteni pred vohuni.
mt: Personal VPN providers are a great way to avoid political censorship and commercial geolocation filtering of IP addresses. They are more capable than web proxy servers, as they redirect all web traffic, not just http. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better service. In addition, they are encrypted, so they are better protected against snooping.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Ker klici potekajo prek interneta, se vam ni treba zanašati na ponudnika telekomunikacijskih storitev iz kraja, kjer živite ali kamor potujete. Poleg tega tudi ni potrebno, da od skupnosti, v kateri živite, pridobite lokalno številko; satelitsko internetno povezavo lahko pridobite v divjini kraja Chicken na Aljaski in izberete številko, ki pravi, da ste v sončni Arizoni. Pogosto je treba ločeno kupiti globalno številko, ki omogoča, da vas lahko pokličejo s telefoni PSTN. Za ljudi, ki vas kličejo, je pomembno, od kje izvira številka.
mt: Because calls are made over the Internet, you don't have to rely on a telecommunications provider in the area where you live or are traveling. Also, you don't have to get a local number from the community where you live; you can get a satellite Internet connection in the wilderness of Chicken, Alaska, and choose a number that says you're in sunny Arizona. Often you have to separately buy a global number that allows people to call you on the PSTN. It's important for people calling you to know where the number is from.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Izgovorjava je v italijanščini relativno preprosta, saj se večina besed izgovori točno tako, kot so napisane. Pozorni morate biti predvsem na črki c in g, saj se njuna izgovorjava razlikuje glede na samoglasnik, ki jima sledi. Prav tako se potrudite, da r in rr izgovarjate drugače: caro pomeni dragi, medtem ko carro pomeni voz.
mt: The pronunciation is relatively straightforward, as most words are pronounced as they are written. You should pay attention to the letters c and g, as their pronunciation differs depending on the vowel that follows them. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, while carro means car.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir je z okoli 3,7 milijonov prebivalcev, drugim največjim pristaniščem po Carigradu in zelo dobrim transportnim vozliščem tretje največje mesto v Turčiji. Nekdanje antično mesto Smirna je danes sodobno, razvito in živahno poslovno središče, ki je zgoščeno okoli velikanskega zaliva, obdanega z gorami. Širokim alejam, stavbam s steklenimi pročelji in sodobnim trgovinskim centrom delajo družbo tradicionalne opečnate strehe, tržnica iz 18. stoletja ter stare mošeje in cerkve, čeprav ima mesto bolj evropsko mediteransko ozračje kot tradicionalno turško.
mt: İzmir is with about 3.7 million inhabitants, the second largest port after Istanbul and very good transport hub the third largest city in Turkey. The ancient city of Smyrna is now a modern, developed and lively business center, which is densely populated around a large bay surrounded by mountains. Wide avenues, buildings with glass facades and modern shopping centers make the company traditional brick roofs, the market of the 18th century and old mosques and churches, although the city has a more European Mediterranean atmosphere than traditional Turkish.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Opazovanje češnjevih cvetov oziroma hanami je del japonske kulture že od 8. stoletja. Ta koncept je prišel s Kitajske, kjer so bile japonske marelice najpogostejša izbira rož. Na Japonskem je prve zabave pod češnjami gostil cesar, priredil pa jih je zase in za ostale člane aristokracije na cesarskem dvoru.
mt: Observing cherry blossoms or hanami is part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. This concept came from China, where Japanese cherry trees were the most popular choice of flowers. In Japan, the first hanami parties were hosted by the emperor, and were held privately and for other members of the aristocracy at the imperial palace.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jeruzalem je prestolnica in največje mesto Izraela, vendar pa ga večina držav ter Združeni narodi ne priznavajo za glavno mesto Izraela. Starodavno mesto v Judejskem hribovju ima osupljivo zgodovino, ki obsega na tisoče let. Je sveto mesto treh monoteističnih religij – judovstva, krščanstva in islama, in služi kot duhovno, versko in kulturno središče. Zaradi verskega pomena mesta in posebno zaradi številnih najdišč na območju Starega mesta je Jeruzalem glavna turistična destinacija v Izraelu. Jeruzalem ima veliko zgodovinskih, arheoloških in kulturnih znamenitosti, poleg tega pa tudi živahna in nabito polna nakupovalna središča, kavarne in restavracije.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although most countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as the capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has an awe-inspiring history spanning thousands of years. It is a holy city for three monotheistic religions – Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Because of the religious significance of the city and especially because of the numerous sites in the area of the Old City, Jerusalem is the main tourist destination in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural landmarks, in addition to lively and bustling shopping centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Narodni park Kruger (KNP) leži na severovzhodu Južne Afrike in se razteza vzdolž meje z Mozambikom na vzhodu, Zimbabvejem na severu, južna meja pa je Krokodilja reka. Park pokriva 19.500 km² in se deli na 14 različnih ekoloških območij, pri čemer vsako podpira drugačno skupino prostoživečega živalstva in rastlinstva. Je ena največjih znamenitosti Južne Afrike in velja za paradnega konja južnoafriških narodnih parkov (SANParks). Plačati je treba dnevno vstopnino za ohranjanje narave in ogled parka, tako kot v vsakem južnoafriškem narodnem parku. Morda bi bilo slabo kupiti prepustnice Wild Card, ki zagotavlja dostop do izbranih parkov v Južni Afriki ali do vseh južnoafriških narodnih parkov.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in northeastern South Africa and stretches along the border with Mozambique on the east, Zimbabwe on the north, and the southern boundary is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different ecological zones, each supporting a different group of free-ranging wildlife and vegetation. It is one of the largest attractions in South Africa and is considered the flagship of South African national parks (SANParks). An entrance fee is required to preserve nature and view the park, as in any South African national park. It would be a bad idea to buy Wild Card passes, which provide access to selected parks in South Africa or all South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
