src: Ker ste torej v domačem okolju nenehno izpostavljeni bakterijam, ki so tam prisotne, ste nanje najverjetneje že imuni. V drugih delih sveta, kjer se lahko srečate z novo bakterijsko floro, pa boste veliko verjetneje naleteli na težave. Poleg tega se v toplejših podnebjih bakterije množijo hitreje in zunaj telesa preživijo dlje. Od tod torej poimenovanja nadloge Delhijevrga trebuha, Faraonovo prekletstvo, Montezumino maščevanje in številnih njihovih prijateljev. Kot so v hladnejših krajih pogoste težave z dihanjem, so v toplih krajih precej pogoste prebavne težave, ki so večinoma zelo neprijetne, a ne ravno nevarne.
mt: Since you are constantly exposed to bacteria that are present in your home environment, you are likely already immune to them. In other parts of the world, where you may encounter a new bacterial flora, you are much more likely to encounter problems. In addition, bacteria multiply faster in warmer climates and survive longer outside the body. Hence the naming of the Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge and many of their friends. As in colder climates, respiratory problems are common, so in warmer climates, gastrointestinal problems are also common, which are very unpleasant, but not exactly dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Evropa je celina, ki je relativno majhna, vendar ima veliko neodvisnih držav. V običajnih okoliščinah bi potovanje skozi več držav pomenilo, da je treba večkrat zaprositi za vizum in prestati preverjanje potnih listov. Schengensko območje pa v tem pogledu deluje nekako kot ena država. Znotraj tega območja lahko prečkate meje, ne da bi šli ponovno čez kontrolne točke, kjer bi morali pokazati potni list. Če imate schengenski vizum, vam prav tako ni treba vložiti prošnje za vizum za vsako državo članico schengenskega območja posebej, s čimer prihranite čas, denar in papirologijo.
mt: Europe is a continent that is relatively small, but has many independent countries. In normal circumstances, traveling through several countries would mean having to apply for a visa and go through passport checks several times. The Schengen Area, however, works somewhat like one country. Within this area, you can cross borders without going through the checkpoints where you would have to show your passport. If you have a Schengen visa, you also do not need to submit an application for a visa for each Schengen member state separately, thereby saving time, money, and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tutankamonova grobnica (KV62). KV62 je morda najbolj znana grobnica v Dolini, prizorišče, kjer je Howard Carter leta 1922 odkril skoraj nedotaknjen kraljevi grob mladega kralja. Nasprotno pa je grobnica Tutankamona v primerjavi z drugimi kraljevimi grobnicami komaj vredna ogleda, saj je veliko manjša in le borno okrašena. Vsakdo, ki želi videti znake poškodb mumije, do katerih je prišlo med poskusi, da bi jo odstranili iz krste, bo razočaran, saj je mogoče videti samo glavo in ramena. Bajnih zakladov grobnice ni več v njej, saj so jih prenesli v Egipčanski muzej v Kairu. Za obiskovalce, ki imajo omejen čas, bi bilo bolje, da ga preživijo drugje.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 is perhaps the most famous tomb in the Valley, the site where Howard Carter discovered the almost intact royal tomb of the young king in 1922. In contrast, the tomb of Tutankhamun in comparison with other royal tombs is barely worth seeing, as it is much smaller and only sparsely decorated. Anyone who wants to see signs of damage to the mummy, which occurred during attempts to remove it from the sarcophagus, will be disappointed, as it is possible to see only the head and shoulders. The treasures of the tomb are no longer in it, as they were transferred to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. For visitors who have limited time, it would be better to spend it elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Otok Bowen je priljubljena izletniška točka za enodnevne izlete ali krajša potovanja ob koncu tedna, saj nudi vožnje s kajaki, pohodniške izlete, trgovine, restavracije itd. Ta avtentična skupnost se nahaja v mestu Howe Sound v bližini Vancouvra, do katerega je mogoče priti z eno od rednih linij vodnih taksijev z izhodiščem na otoku Granville v mestnem središču Vancouvra. Če uživate v aktivnostih na prostem, morate obvezno poskusiti treking po koridorju Od morja do neba. Whistler (1,5 ure vožnje iz Vancouvra) je drag, vendar je dobro poznan zaradi zimskih olimpijskih iger 2010. Pozimi si lahko privoščite enega najlepših smučarskih doživetij v Severni Ameriki, poleti pa se lahko preizkusite v gorskem kolesarjenju.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular take-off point for day trips or shorter flights at the end of the week, as it offers kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, etc. This authentic community is located in the town of Howe Sound near Vancouver, which can be reached by one of the regular water taxi lines with a starting point in the city center of Vancouver. If you enjoy outdoor activities, you must try the trekking along the path From Sea to Sky. Whistler (1.5 hours drive from Vancouver) is expensive, but is well known for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In winter you can afford one of the most beautiful skiing experiences in North America, in summer you can test yourself in mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls je mesto v zahodnem delu Zimbabveja, na drugi strani meje od Livingstona v Zambiji in blizu Bocvane. Mesto leži neposredno ob slapovih, ki so največja znamenitost, vendar ta priljubljena turistična točka pustolovcem in ljubiteljem znamenitosti nudi tudi druge možnosti raziskovanja za daljše bivanje. V deževnem obdobju (od novembra do marca) se poveča količina vode, zato so slapovi še bolj dramatični. Če boste prečkali most ali hodili po poteh, ki se vijejo v bližini Slapov, se boste zagotovo zmočili. Po drugi strani pa ravno velika količina vode povzroča, da je vaš pogled na dejanske slapove zamegljen – zaradi vse te vode!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in western Zimbabwe, on the other side of the border from Livingstone in Zambia and near Botswana. The town is situated directly beside the falls, which are the main tourist attraction, but this popular tourist destination for adventurers and sightseers also offers other opportunities for exploration for longer stays. In the rainy season (from November to March) the amount of water increases, so the falls are even more dramatic. If you cross the bridge or walk along the paths that wind around the Falls, you will definitely be soaked. On the other hand, the large amount of water causes your view of the actual falls to be obscured – because of all that water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Pravila, ki se nanašajo na navadno fotografijo, veljajo tudi za snemanje, morda celo še bolj. Če je že samo fotografiranje nedovoljeno, potem ne bi smeli niti pomisliti na to, da bi posneli video. Če uporabljate brezpilotne letalnike, pravočasno preverite, ali je snemanje dovoljeno in katera dovoljenja ali dodatne licence so potrebne. Brezpilotnega letalnika skoraj nikoli ni pametno upravljati v bližini letališča, tudi če to v vašem okolišu ni protizakonito.
mt: Rules that apply to normal photography also apply to filming, perhaps even more so. If it is already illegal to photograph, then you should not even think about filming. If you use unmanned aerial vehicles, check immediately if filming is allowed and what permissions or additional licenses are required. It is almost never smart to operate an unmanned aerial vehicle near an airport, even if this is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

mt: Rules that apply to normal photography also apply to filming, perhaps even more so. If it is already illegal to photograph, then you should not even think about filming. If you use unmanned aerial vehicles, check immediately if filming is allowed and what permissions or additional licenses are required. It is almost never smart to operate an unmanned aerial vehicle near an airport, even if this is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Registracija je dodatna zahteva v postopku pridobitve vizuma. V nekaterih državah morate pri lokalnih oblasteh registrirati svojo prisotnost in naslov bivanja. V ta namen boste morda morali izpolniti obrazec na lokalni policijski postaji ali obiskati urad za priseljence. V veliko državah s tovrstnim zakonom bodo za registracijo poskrbeli v lokalnih hotelih (ne pozabite jih prositi). V vseh ostalih primerih se morajo registrirati samo tisti, ki bivajo zunaj turističnih nastanitev. Vendar pa je zaradi tega zakon toliko bolj nejasen, zato se pozanimajte vnaprej.
mt: Registration is an additional requirement in the visa application process. In some countries you must register your presence and address of residence with local authorities. For this purpose you may have to fill out a form at the local police station or visit the immigration office. In many countries with such a law, hotels will take care of the registration (don't forget to ask). In all other cases only those who live outside tourist accommodations must register. However, the law is so vague that you should check in advance.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Prostovoljno delo med potovanjem je odličen način, kako prispevati k spremembam, ampak ni vse v razdajanju sebe. Življenje in prostovoljstvo v tuji državi je odličen način za spoznavanje različnih kultur, novih ljudi in sebe, za pridobivanje širše perspektive ter celo pridobivanje novih veščin. To je tudi dober način za prihranek denarja in podaljšanje bivanja, saj veliko prostovoljnih del krije posteljo in hrano, nekatera pa celo nudijo skromno plačo.
mt: Volunteering during travel is a great way to contribute to change, but not all in giving yourself. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know different cultures, new people and yourself, to gain a wider perspective and even gain new skills. This is also a good way to save money and extend your stay, as many volunteer work hides a bed and food, some even offer a modest salary.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Potovanje v Walt Disney World je za številne ameriške družine velika romarska pot. ""Značilni"" izlet vključuje pristanek na mednarodnem letališču v Orlandu, avtobusni prevoz do Disneyjevega hotela, enotedensko bivanje znotraj zidov Disneyjevega posestva in povratek domov. Možnih je nešteto variant, vendar je to tisto, kar ima največ ljudi v mislih, ko govorijo o ""obisku Disney Worlda"". Veliko vstopnic, ki se prodajajo na dražbenih spletnih mestih, kot sta eBay in Craigslist, je delno porabljenih, večdnevnih vstopnic za vstop v več parkov. Ta dejavnost je sicer zelo pogosta, vendar jo družba Disney prepoveduje: vozovnice niso prenosljive."
mt: "A trip to Walt Disney World is a major pilgrimage for many American families.  The ""typical"" vacation includes a landing at Orlando's international airport, a bus ride to a Disney hotel, a one-week stay within the walls of Disney's property, and a return home.  There are countless variations, but this is what most people have in mind when they talk about ""visiting Disney World.""  Many tickets, sold on auction sites like eBay and Craigslist, are partially used, multi-day tickets for entry into multiple parks.  This practice is very common, but Disney prohibits it: tickets are not transferable."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Vsakdo, ki načrtuje obisk države, ki jo je mogoče obravnavati kot vojno območje, bi si moral priskrbeti strokovno usposabljanje. Če na internetu iščete »tečaj o sovražnem okolju«, boste najverjetneje pridobili naslov lokalnega podjetja. Tečaj običajno zajema vse tukaj omenjene težave veliko bolj podrobno, ponavadi skupaj s praktičnim izkušnjami. Tečaj običajno traja 2–5 dni in vključuje igranje vlog, veliko postopkov prve pomoči in občasno tudi urjenje za rokovanje z orožjem. Knjige in revije o preživetju v naravi so razširjene, publikacij o vojnih območjih pa je le peščica.
mt: Everyone planning a visit to a country that can be considered a war zone should seek out professional training. If you search the internet for "survival in hostile environments," you will likely find the name of a local company. The course typically covers all of the above in much greater detail, often including practical experience. The course typically lasts 2–5 days and includes role-playing, extensive first aid procedures, and occasionally weapons training. Books and magazines on survival in the wild are widespread, publications on war zones are a mere pebble.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Obstaja več načinov prečiščevanja vode, med katerimi so proti določenim nevarnostim nekateri bolj učinkoviti. V nekaterih območjih zadostuje, če vodo vrete eno minuto, v drugih območjih jo je treba vreti nekaj minut. Filtri se po učinkovitosti razlikujejo in če imate pomisleke, vodo raje kupite v zaprti steklenici od preverjenega podjetja.
mt: There are several ways to purify water, some of which are more effective against certain hazards. In some areas, water is safe to drink after being boiled for one minute, in other areas it must be boiled for several minutes. Filters vary in effectiveness and if you have concerns, it is better to buy water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Povratni tokovi so tokovi, ki se vračajo od valov, ki se lomijo ob obali, pogosto na grebenih ali čim podobnim. Zaradi podvodne topologije je povratni tok na nekaj globljih odsekih koncentriran in tam se lahko oblikuje hiter tok proti globini. Večina smrti se zgodi zaradi utrujenosti pri plavanju nazaj proti toku, kar je lahko nemogoče. Ko se vam uspe rešiti iz toka, ne bo plavanje nazaj nič drugačno od običajnega. Poskusite se usmeriti nekam, kjer se ne boste ponovno ujeli, ali pa glede na vaše spretnosti in glede na to, ali so vas opazili, počakate na reševalce.
mt: Return currents are currents that return from waves breaking on the shore, often on reefs or similar. Due to underwater topography, return currents are concentrated on some deeper sections and can form a fast current towards the bottom. Most deaths happen due to exhaustion while swimming back against the current, which can be impossible. Once you get out of the current, swimming back is no different from normal. Try to steer yourself somewhere you won't get caught again, or if you're skilled enough and if you've been noticed, wait for rescuers.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Celinske vodne poti so lahko dobra rdeča nit za organizacijo potovanja. Na primer, obiskovanje gradov v dolini reke Loare, dolini reke Ren ali križarjenje do zanimivih mest ob Donavi ali pa čolnarjenje po Eriejskem prekopu. Uporabljene so tudi kot priljubljene pohodniške in kolesarske poti.
mt: Inland waterways can be a good red thread for organizing travel. For example, visiting castles along the Loire valley, the Rhone valley or cruising to interesting towns along the Danube or Erie Canal. They are also used as popular hiking and cycling routes.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Regija na severu meji na Sahel, na jugu in zahodu pa na Atlantski ocean. Ženske: vsem ženskim popotnicam priporočamo, da rečejo, da so poročene, ne glede na dejanski zakonski stan. Pomaga tudi, če nosite prstan (vendar ne takega, ki je že po videzu veliko vreden. Ženske bi se morale zavedati, da lahko kulturne razlike povzročijo vtis, da gre za nadlegovanje, in nič nenavadnega ni, da jim sledijo, jih zgrabijo za roko itd. Moške odločno zavrnite in ne bojte se braniti svojega stališča (to ni sprejemljivo, ne glede na kulturne razlike).
mt: The region borders the Sahel to the north, and the Atlantic Ocean to the south and west. Women: all female travelers are advised to say they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It also helps to wear a ring (but not one that looks very expensive). Women should be aware that cultural differences may lead to the impression that you are being harassed, and it is not unusual for them to follow you, grab your hand, etc. Reject male advances firmly and do not be afraid to defend your position (this is not acceptable, regardless of cultural differences).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Prostoživeče živali so za fotografa eden od najzahtevnejših motivov, ki zahteva kombinacijo sreče, potrpežljivosti, izkušenj in dobre opreme. Fotografiranje prostoživečih živali pogosto jemljemo kot nekaj samoumevnega, vendar na splošno za fotografiranje drži, da je slika vredna več kot tisoč besed. Za fotografiranje prostoživečih živali je običajno potreben dolg teleobjektiv, jate ptic ali majhna bitja in podobno pa terjajo uporabo drugih objektivov. Veliko eksotičnih živali je težko najti, parki pa imajo včasih pravila o fotografiranju za komercialno uporabo. Divje živali so lahko plahe ali pa napadalne. Okolje je lahko hladno, vroče ali kako drugače neprijazno.
mt: Free-ranging animals are one of the most challenging subjects to photograph, requiring a combination of luck, patience, experience, and good equipment. Photographing free-ranging animals is often taken as something of a given, but in general, a picture is worth more than a thousand words. To photograph free-ranging animals is usually required a long telephoto lens, a tripod, and similar equipment. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks may have rules about commercial use of photographs. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot, or otherwise unpleasant.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Vsak, ki bo peljal na visokih nadmorskih višinah ali čez gorske prelaze, mora upoštevati možnost snega, ledu ali temperature pod lediščem. Na poledenelih in zasneženih cestiščih je oprijem slab in ne morete peljati tako, kot če bi bili na golem asfaltu. Med snežnimi viharji lahko v zelo kratkem času zapade dovolj snega, da ostanete ujeti. Vidljivost je lahko omejena tudi zaradi sneženja ali snega, ki ga nosi veter, ali pa zaradi kondenzata ali ledu na oknih vozil. Po drugi strani pa so ledene in snežne razmere v številnih državah nekaj običajnega in promet večinoma nemoteno poteka skozi vse leto.
mt: Everyone who will be flying at high altitudes or over mountain passes must take into account the possibility of snow, ice or temperatures below freezing. On icy and snow-covered roads, the grip is poor and you cannot drive as if you were on a large asphalt. During snowstorms, you can be trapped in a very short time by enough snow. Visibility can be limited even by snowfall or snow carried by the wind, or by condensation or ice on the vehicle's windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are common in many countries and traffic is usually running smoothly throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Če niste diplomat, delo na drugi strani oceana običajno pomeni, da boste morali vložiti davek od dohodka v državi, v kateri ste. Dohodnina je v različnih državah različno strukturirana, davčne stopnje in razredi pa se od ene države do druge močno razlikujejo. V nekaterih zveznih državah, kot so Združene države Amerike in Kanada, se dohodnina odmerja na državni in lokalni ravni, zato se lahko stopnje in razredi razlikujejo glede na regijo.
mt: If you're not a diplomat, working on the other side of the ocean usually means you'll have to pay income tax in the country where you're working. Income is structured differently in different countries, tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied at the state and local level, so rates and brackets can vary depending on the region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Svetovni sejem (splošno znan tudi kot svetovna razstava ali preprosto razstava) je velik mednarodni festival umetnosti in znanosti. Sodelujoče države v narodnih paviljonih predstavljajo umetniške in izobraževalne razstave, s katerimi izpostavljajo svetovne problematike ali kulturo in zgodovino svoje države. Mednarodne vrtnarske razstave so specializirani dogodki s cvetličnimi razstavami, botaničnimi vrtovi in drugimi dejavnostmi, povezanimi z rastlinami. Čeprav se teoretično lahko odvijajo vsako leto (dokler so v različnih državah), se praktično to ne zgodi. Prireditve običajno trajajo od tri do šest mesecev in se odvijajo na mestih, velikih najmanj 50 hektarjev.
mt: A World's Fair (also known as a world's fair, world exposition, universal exposition, or international exposition) is a large international exhibition designed to celebrate universal progress and promote world peace and understanding. Participating countries and organizations build their own pavilions and showcase their achievements in the fields of technology, science, and culture. International expositions are special events that are held for a period of three to six months and are usually located on sites of at least 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Čeprav so v parku mnoge živali navajene na prisotnost ljudi, so divje živali še vedno divje, in se jih zato ne bi smelo hraniti ali vznemirjati. Po navedbah uprave parka se zadržujte najmanj 100 jardov/metrov stran od medvedov in volkov ter 25 jardov/metrov stran od vseh ostalih prostoživečih živali. Bizoni, kanadski jeleni, losi, medvedi in domala vse velike živali lahko napadejo, naj so videti še tako krotke. Vsako leto se poškoduje na desetine obiskovalcev, ker ne ohranjajo zadostne razdalje. Te živali so velike, divje in potencialno nevarne, zato jih pustite pri miru. Poleg tega morate vedeti, da vonjave privlačijo medvede in druge divje živali, zato ne nosite ali kuhajte hrane z močnim vonjem in v kampu ohranjajte čistočo.
mt: While many animals in the park are accustomed to the presence of people, wild animals are still wild, and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park officials, stay at least 100 yards away from bears and wolves and 25 yards away from all other wildlife. Bison, Canadian elk, moose, bears and almost all large animals can attack, even if they look so tame. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they do not maintain sufficient distance. These animals are large, wild and potentially dangerous, so leave them alone. In addition, you must know that odors attract bears and other wild animals, so do not carry or cook food with a strong odor and keep cleanliness in the camp.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
